At the beginning of 2014 , father and son Wille started building their own filament extruder. They decided to do this because of the growing interest in 3D printing technology, the knowledge of plastic within the company and the company network. 3D4Makers is the result from a company that primarily dealt with selling plastic raw materials. Now the 3D4Makers team consists of five members, each with their own specialties. 

While building the filament extruder and testing it we found out that moisture in the filament can cause problems while printing. Moisture in the filament as wel as low purity of our material are the most important apects that will lower the quality of the printing product. 3D4Makers took this problem into account while building the filament extruder as well as buing the best raw material there is.On top of this our filament is directly- and vacuum packaged after the production process. 

Our material and production process makes the 3D4Makers filament particularly suitable for FDM and FFF 3D printers. The material has an excellent adhesion between the layers. This results in great improvement of the impact resistance, strength, durability, the printing process and ‚Äúwarping‚Äù.

We are able to respond to specific questions related to to specific applications of filament. I.e. medical, automotive, machinery and others. If you would like the check the possibilities, please contakt us.

Daarnaast bieden wij klanten de mogelijkheid een kant-en-klare kantoorfaciliteit te huren en zijn wij in het bezit van een BRC-certificaat zodat de voedselveiligheid tijdens de gehele logistieke keten wordt gewaarborgd. Sprinklr zet je werkplek vol planten!

Planten brengen stresslevels omlaag, tussen planten werken mensen geconcentreerder, creatiever en productiever. Da's allemaal wetenschappelijk bewezen. Bovendien zijn ze uitstekend in het gezond maken van die kantoorlucht die vaak te droog is. Nog een plus van planten: ze absorberen geroezemoes en andere geluiden. 

Stel je wil planten op je werkplek! Dat regelen wij op twee manieren.

1. Makkelijk online bestellen
Jij kiest de planten via onze website, wij brengen ze bij je op kantoor. Met onze verzorgingstips houdt jij of een collega de planten jarenlang groen. 

Voor het bestellen even bellen voor advies over welke planten te kiezen kan natuurlijk altijd.

2. Jij pakt het groots aan, dus wij pakken het groots aan.
Wil je een transformatie? Top. Bel ons, mail ons! Met behulp van foto's, filmpjes of visite bekijken we je lichtinval, hoe de lucht stroomt, waar de verwarming zit... en zo komen we erachter welke planten goed zijn voor jouw kantoor. We bespreken de stijl die je tof vindt. Wil je strak? Wil je jungle? Wil je cactus? Wil je eighties? Wil je bamboe? Of het nou om planten gaat of potten, de keuze is reuze.

Naar aanleiding van jouw wensen en budget en de mogelijkheden die jouw kantoor biedt (wij weigeren planten neer te zetten op een plek waar ze niet gelukkig gaan zijn, sorry maar dat is ook echt beter voor jou), maken we een mooie offerte. Net zo lang tot je staat te juichen en niet kan wachten tot het groen naar binnen gesjouwd wordt en je kantoor getransformeerd is naar een heerlijk groene werkplek.

Verzorging kun je zelf gaan doe met onze tips, of we zorgen ervoor dat er regelmatig iemand met groene vingers bij je langskomt.

We turn the burden of unconsumed inventory into an opportunity by building a circular learning system in the beauty industry. Arkive partners with brands and distributors to digitize inventory in the beauty industry that would otherwise be wasted, or facilitates the growth of grey markets.

companyName: DE BOER STAAL | YOU build WE supply
description:
Steel en steel processing

De Boer Staal and De Boer Snijbedrijf are both located on the same premises in Uitgeest and work closely together.

De Boer Staal is a renowned wholesale distributor of sheet steel, profiles and bulb flats and has large stocks of steel in a range of sizes, grades and thicknesses. All standard sizes and grades for the shipbuilding industry, among others, are in stock and therefore immediatly available. This makes De Boer Staal flexible and able to offer complete projects at short notice.

De Boer Snijbedrijf specialises in cutting steel and stainless steel in every shape and supplies oxy-fuel, plasma and laser cut components in thickness varying from 0.5 to 750 mm. De Boer Snijbedrijf also supplies certified cut components that have been checked and assessed by Lloyds Register LR, Veritas, ABS or DNV and is authorised to re-mark materials with a 3.1 en 3.2 inspection certification in accordance with EN 10204.

De Boer Staal has its own coating line and thus the opportunity to shot blast and coat sheet steel and profiles for the shipbuilding and offshore industry. This gives De Boer Snijbedrijf the opportunity to offer blasted cut products. The steel companies in Uitgeest offer under one roof large stocks of sheet steel and profiles, the cutting and forming of steel sheets in combination with shot blasting and coating. The companies also supply complete ready-made shipbuilding kits.

Whisper Power is an international leader in the development, production and maintenance of modern (hybrid) energy and propulsion systems. BiOBUDDi is committed to build a better tomorrow, and for this reason, develops and makes eco-friendly products. 
 
From our biobased materials to our manufacturing in the Netherlands, we‚Äôre raising awareness about sustainability while delivering unquestionably safe products. We believe that the best way to encourage environmental change is through goods people buy and use every day. Our story started with a dream of a father. 

To prevent the temperature from rising any further BiOBUDDi searched for a resource of their products that absorbs carbon dioxide. A resource which is recyclable and usable for the production of toys for children. We discovered these traits in sugarcane plants. These plants absorb carbon dioxide to grow while turning it into oxygen. ¬†Sugarcane plants are used by the food industry but also for clothing and medicine. 

The plant has a lot of usage but it also leaves some non-usable part. That non-usable part is the main part of the natural compound that BiOBUDDi uses for their products. The non-usable part of these sugarcane processing can be used to create bio-ethanol, this is a kind of alcohol used to create green polyethylene (Green PE). This polyethylene is compounded in Europe with extra natural resources. The compound that is created with this is patented by BiOBUDDi. All BiOBUDDi products are made with the compound that is highly biobased and we are the only using this unique compound in the world. It is a process that results in a large saving of CO2 in the atmosphere. It is a process that is circular.

All BiOBUDDi products are safe , educational and eco-friendly. If you would like to know more about BiOBUDDi feel free to contact us. 

Build a better tomorrow!

Binnen de groep levert Atelier van Zijderveld ‚Äòsignwerk‚Äô. Van autobelettering tot lichtreclame en van gevelbord tot uitgebreide tentoonstellingsbouw. Met een eigen zagerij, meubelmakerij, metaalwerkplaats en beletteringswerkplaats hebben we hier alles in huis om maatwerk te leveren.

Catchy beats. It‚Äôs in our DNA. Bottle popping events. It‚Äôs in our DNA. Guiding young talents. It‚Äôs in our DNA. Hosting Mixmash stages all over the world. It's in our DNA. 

Ever since Mixmash Records saw the light in 2004 we have been spreading our musical influence to every corner of the globe. Rocking venues and festivals is one of our most noted trademarks - from China to the US and India to The Netherlands, we see no boundaries or borders.

Under the creative vision of our founding father Laidback Luke, we drop cutting edge music made by the heavyweights of today and tomorrow. While in the process of signing and guiding new talent, we are not afraid to ‚Äòbe the first‚Äô and take a leap of faith - even if this means working harder than the rest. 

Always humble, yet we pride ourselves in creating a #MixmashFam feeling which is entangled in the core identity of our exclusive artists. Our current Mixmash Family Members who are rockin‚Äô the mothership besides Laidback Luke are gifted DJ/producers such as Keanu Silva, Lady Bee, Pyrodox and Unity. 

Mixmash‚Äôs mission is to discover, develop and empower unique artists. We market them via the main platform and beyond to spread their unique stories through music. 

We believe in unique storytelling as the main driver to realize dreams in this industry. By being part of a bigger plan that empowers artists to spread their unique story globally, we‚Äôre always on the lookout to be an early adapter within the world of music, trends and other forms of creativity. 

We are pioneers and proven game-changers when it comes to discovering talented uprisers and guiding them to become industry giants. With music at our core and in our hearts, we will never stop expanding our vision and #MixmashFam. It‚Äôs in our DNA.

CONNY JANSSEN DANST, located in Rotterdam, has been one of the most prominent modern dance troupes in the Netherlands since 1992. The works of its artistic leader Conny Janssen are widely known for their strongly physical and theatrical power of the dancers, and the surprising diversity of their performances, in which highly qualitative dance is always paramount. The thematic of the big city forms a significant breeding ground. Conny Janssen is a specialist in creating on-site performances: from theatre to factory hall, from church to parking garage. By entering into alliances with artists and institutions from the world of photography, film industry, architecture, theater and music, Conny Janssen puts dance in a broader perspective. The works of Conny Janssen were repeatedly accoladed and are to be seen on both national and international festivals. On account of this, the troupe developed into an important promoter of modern dance.

Een FLASKE voorkomt dat er 40 plastic flesjes in de oceaan terechtkomen.

Van de 400 miljoen ton plastics dat elk jaar wereldwijd wordt geproduceerd, wordt ongeveer 10% gerecycled. De rest wordt verbrand, komt op vuilnisbelten of in onze natuur terecht. Elk jaar komen er miljoenen kilo‚Äôs plastic in onze oceanen bij, het grootste deel via onze rivieren. Dit is dan ook een groeiend probleem voor ons ecosysteem, gezondheid en economie. 

Volgens de visie van sacksea kan en moet het percentage gerecyclede plastics omhoog en levert dan ook graag haar bijdrage aan het opruimen & hergebruiken van plastic afval in haar nieuwe design producten. Sacksea richt zich op grondstoffen verkregen vanuit ‚Äòclean up‚Äô initiatieven en geeft waarde aan oude plastics ‚Äòcycle up‚Äô door ze te verwerken in onze nieuwe producten ‚Äòbag up‚Äô. 

De sacksea zitzak is volledig vervaardigd van gerecycled materiaal en hoogwaardig geproduceerd in Nederland. U zult jarenlang genieten van onze kwaliteitsproducten. Design, functioneel en geeft bovenal een goed gevoel. Aan het eind van de levensduur halen we de zitzak graag bij u op om er vervolgens weer nieuwe producten van te maken. Zo blijven we dicht bij onze waarden.   

Sacksea
Clean up, Cycle up, Bag up!

Als je bij ons op het strand bent, zul je merken dat er bij Natural High vier idealen zijn verankerd, die terug komen in alles wat wij doen; passie, vrijheid, natuur en plezier. Onze passie ligt in onze roots: kitesurfen. De passie voor het kitesurfen is de drijfveer achter onze organisatie. Vrijheid, natuur en plezier zijn onlosmakelijk verbonden met die passie. Wat die passie dan precies inhoudt? Passie voor de natuurlijke elementen, passie voor het strand, de zee en de wind, passie voor het √©√©n zijn met de natuur en het vergeten van de rest van de wereld, passie voor actie en avontuur, passie voor het vrije en onbezorgde leven, passie voor de ongedwongen en relaxte sfeer, passie voor prachtige en gezellige dagen op het strand die nooit lijken te eindigen en last but not least: de passie om al dit moois te delen met iedereen die bij ons op het strand komt.

Wij nodigen je graag uit Natural High te komen beleven‚Ä¶

Rhea [Ree-ah].
Originating from early Greek mythology, as the ‚ÄòThe Great Mother‚Äô. Rhea represented the eternal flow of time and generations. With that responsibility - we take our knitwear seriously. Ringing true to the name, Rhea manifests the values and aesthetics of nature. Astutely aware of our societal role, our impact, and the profound difference we can make together. Committed to responsible consumption and cultivating sustainable buying habits within our community, we are practicing our intuitive purpose. A need of fewer, better garments that support our authentic self.

We‚Äôre in tune to the mood of the world, deeply connected to human emotion and continuously reflecting and adapting to the most sustainable practices and needs of our partners and community. This led us to consciously chosen steps for each part of the process, from the main fiber sourcing, to the production process and extending the life cycle of our knitwear.

Utilising one of nature‚Äôs hero fibers, we create knitwear in harmony with the environment in a sustainable production process. We build valued relationships with our partners to raise the standards globally. Both in our supply chain as well with our Rhea Foundation.

The story behind our knitwear is just as beautiful as the garments themselves.

There is one thing we truly love; seeing spaces work their magic on people. This is why we like bringing our spaces to life ‚Äì by decorating them with all our favourite finds in the field of furniture, arts, accessories and curiosa. Everything ‚Äì really. Aprons, boudoirs, cushions. As long as it‚Äôs not your usual ABC.

In case you‚Äôve ever been to a lamp store, you know it sells lamps. Just like carpet stores are carpeted with carpets. But. If you‚Äôre looking to add some serious character to your interior, say, by hanging a seven feet plane from your ceiling, it might be a good idea to first see if things fit together. Enter the Loft. We hope we can provide you some inspiration on how to solve your interior puzzle.

First of all; each and every thing in your sight can be purchased. If you can touch it, it means you can take it back home. So feel free to flick through our online store or come visit one of our meticulously decorated showrooms. We promise you‚Äôll feel right at home and you won‚Äôt want to leave ‚Äì empty handed, that is.

We have a deeply rooted love for natural materials ‚Äì and a rather unsubtle aversion from nonrecycled plastic. We like our stuff to be either carved out of wood, cut from leather, blown into glass or drummed into steel. We love wool. And covet ceramics. These materials tell a lot about the love and attention invested in a product.

We love objects that stay close to their origin. Take oak ‚Äì as a living tree it‚Äôs at its very best, of course. Yet good design can capture this beauty in essence. We‚Äôre particularly fond of design that draws you to the edge of your seat, that makes you want to touch it, get to know it better and understand it a little more.

Windstroom is een innovatieve organisatie die de trends in de markt nauw in de gaten houdt. Daarbij richten we ons op productontwikkeling en kennisdeling in de markt. We willen windenergie voor iedereen toegankelijk maken.
Windstroom is aangesloten bij de branchevereniging NWEA. Voor en met haar leden werkt NWEA aan de sterke windsector. Tevens participeren wij in de commissie van kleinschalige windenergie.
Bij windstroom werken we vanuit een passie voor groene energie. Naast een rijke historie in de solar geloven wij ook in de toekomst van kleinschalige en micro windturbines. Solar is niet altijd overal toe te passen door bijvoorbeeld ruimtegebrek.
Daarom is onze missie ook het toegankelijk maken van windenergie voor iedereen. Windstroom is een jonge organisatie voortgekomen vanuit SolarDistri.

At Lensball we have created a perfect 60 - or 80mm sphere, that bends light to form a tiny projection of the world behind it.

We found a way to make perfectly round balls out of square blocks of hardened crystal, by using a large sequence of special grinding and polishing techniques. The result is a stunning sphere that everyone wants to hold, and that has the same optic quality as professional camera lenses. It's a work of art, and we are proud to share it with the world!

It's a great centerpiece on a desk, a beautiful present, and a stunningly simple tool that allows photographers worldwide to capture the world in spectacular wide-angle.

At Lensball we are always open to new ideas, approaches, and a fresh look. We are convinced that the future lies in the hands of the companies like Lensball - young, creative, flexible and irresistible.

Nino Sumah (founder en 2 meter lang) heeft jarenlang moeite gehad om een kwalitatief modieuze jeans te vinden. Hij besloot daarom zelf een jeanslabel te starten en lanceert zijn bedrijf in 2020.

Clean, stijlvol, modieus en kwaliteit daar staat Bukser Jeans voor, men liet zich inspireren door de Scandinavische stijl, hier is ook de naam uit voortgekomen. Bukser is de vertaling van broek in het Deens. Een krachtige merknaam dat goed bij het label past. 

Het jeanslabel focust zich op de lange mannen van Nederland, echter betekent het niet dat Bukser Jeans alleen geschikt is voor lange mannen, ook de doorsnee man kan zich kleden in een Bukser Jeans. 

Bij het merk zijn er smallere taillematen voor lange mannen wat uniek is en lastig te vinden, men start bij taille maat 28 en loopt door tot 36 en heeft lengte maten van 32 t/m 38.

Bukser Jeans produceert milieubewust en zorgt voor hoge kwaliteit, zo werken zij met de prachtige stof Candiani die bekend staat om een kwalitatieve en milieubewuste stof die niet meer weg te denken is in de jeanswereld. 

Ook vindt Bukser Jeans de arbeidsomstandigheden erg belangrijk en kiest daarom de productie plaats te laten vinden in Portugal, waar zij nauw contact hebben met de producent en regelmatig de fabriek bezoekt. 

Bukser jeans staat open voor samenwerkingen zowel op het gebied van B2B als op B2C, neem daarom gerust contact op via het e-mailadres info@bukserjeans.com

At Velor, we believe that the way we produce and consume must change to ensure a sustainable future for our children and grandchildren. We are committed to proving that this can be done, starting with cycling garments.
Velor strives to create fully circular and low carbon footprint garments for all cycling lovers.

Velor gives recycled resources the value they deserve. And even better: 95% (plus) of our garments are from renewable feedstock, from body to zippers and sleeves. We have designed our high-quality garments in such a way that they can easily be recycled, making sure the material never exits the loop.

Spriet wil het voor ouders zo makkelijk mogelijk maken om de natuur met hun kinderen te ervaren. Dichtbij huis, of zelfs thuis. En op een moment dat het uitkomt. Zo brengen we samen de natuur dichter bij kinderen.

Dus leveren we inspiratie en tips. Maar voor wie meteen in de actie wil, bieden we onze Spriet-box. Hiermee kan je meteen met natuuractiviteiten aan de slag en ontdek je de wonderen van de natuur op een speelse manier, met gebruik van al je zintuigen. Heb je meteen een alternatief voor een filmpje of spelletje op een scherm!

We vinden het super belangrijk dat we onze dienst op een duurzame manier leveren. Daarom streven we bij al onze producten en processen naar een minimale footprint. Zo bestaat ons drukwerk uit 100% gerecycled papier (FSC-gecertificeerd) en werken we zoveel als mogelijk met biologische en duurzame leveranciers.

In de nabije toekomst willen we een gedeelte van onze winst doneren aan doelen die zich richten op natuurbehoud. Ook willen we pakketten doneren aan kinderen die hier, om wat voor reden dan ook, geen toegang toe hebben. 

Want alleen zo integreren we de natuur in ons leven en behouden we haar voor de toekomst van onze kinderen.

THE NEW ORIGINALS (est. 2015, Amsterdam) makes performance clothing for creatives. We strive to make durable and long-lasting apparel that brings emphasis to one‚Äôs individuality.‚Ä®‚Ä®We believe that‚Äîby thinking out of the box‚Äîanyone, regardless of their background can find and flourish within their creative potential.‚Ä®‚Ä®Thinking out of the box is defined by us as thinking divergent and free of boundaries. We aim to build bridges between different contexts and backgrounds while offering a platform for creativity.

_________________________________________________________________________

Origin‚Ä®The New Originals find their early beginnings in 2011, as a close group of friends running a blog to share and curate interests within fashion, design and music. TNO started making name in Amsterdam‚Äôs nightlife scene by hosting parties at its infamous venues under the pseudonym TNO SoundSystem. Officially founded in 2015 by Rizky Lasahido, Maru Asmellash and Eben Badu, TNO has since then grown into a full fledged brand. ‚Äò



Think out of the Box
The 9 Dots logo represents a box, referring to an old riddle. The puzzle proposes the challenge to connect all 9 Dots with 4 straight lines. To solve this puzzle, all one requires to do is ‚ÄòThink out of the Box‚Äô, this has become the motto and spirit under which we operate!



What else?
The basis is and remains of course clothing but our creativity reaches far beyond. As a brand, we are deeply rooted in Amsterdam‚Äôs cultural landscape.¬†Grounded in its many components¬†and disciplines such as art, music, fashion, nightlife and other areas of creative expression.

Our curriculum vitae runs deep. Besides the numerous collaborations with creatives, artists and musicians you may know us from our partnerships with cultural organisations and museums or whipping up and serving our own milkshakes as TNO Milkshake Farmers or of our own yearly music festival with our close friends Smib for SMIB X TNO Fest.

OUR STORY

Gabbiano¬Æ is an urban casual lifestyle brand influenced by Italian roots and fine Dutch craftsmanship. Our path started in Tuscany, Italy, with a journey that inspired us to make a global fashion brand for the urban man. The Tuscany landscapes, Its history, and the appreciation for high culture inspired us to create this brand. At Gabbiano we believe in good quality and know that every small detail matters. We embrace challenges, seek new opportunities, and always remain authentic.
Since 2011 GABBIANO has been combining innovation and attention to detail to create the Gabbiano Men's Collection.‚Äù Clothing of great quality with a perfect fit‚Äù. Gabbiano operates in the mid-high segment and targets men who embrace the urban way of life. We distribute our collections throughout Europe through selected local premium retailers, department stores and e-commerce partners.

OUR GOAL

We design Gabbiano for the man who goes beyond just tradition and stays innovative with his look. A free man who loves to travel and explore, never giving life an opportunity to become dull. His days are filled with excitement and action, whether at home, at work, or on the move to his next destination. He doesn‚Äôt follow the crowd, instead he creates his own journey. This is ‚ÄòThe urban way of life‚Äô.  This is GABBIANO.

OUR INSPIRATION

To stay innovative with our collections, we travel to major urban cities for inspiration. Each city has its unique balance between nature and structure which we use in combination to create our unique themes. Every part of our collections has its own story. We create collections complete from top to bottom, crafted especially for the Gabbiano man. The key to our collections is balancing our unique identity, high quality clothing, and creating the perfect fit. Each detail is carefully thought through by our experienced designers. The most important goal we have is to let the Gabbiano man express himself though quality fashion.

The Swapshop is a chain of shops where it's all about swapping (exchanging) of clothes and other fashion items. The Swapshop offers an circular alternative for the lineair model of discharging and consuming of fashion items. 
In this way we reduce the enormous waste, overconsumption and pollution within the clothing industry. 

This is how it works: at The Swapshop people can hand in their unwanted clothes and get rewarded with Swaps. With these Swaps and an amount of service fee, dependent on the quality and type of item, other handed in clothes can be bought. In our physical shops, but soon also online!

We aim to be fully circular. Clothes that are not suited for swapping or our target group, we use to recycle into products for our The Swapshop productline. These products we will soon sell in our shops √°nd online. 
In this way all handed in clothes eventually come back to our swapping community.

Werken bij Lofty Manner
Wij groeien hard. Da‚Äôs maar goed ook, want onze ambitie is groot. Binnen vijf jaar willen wij een gevestigd merk zijn in West-Europa. Bovendien werken we toe naar een toekomst waarin we 100% sustainable produceren. Wil jij meebouwen √©n meegroeien? Dat kan! Bekijk onze vacatures. 

Lofty Manner & Retail 
Wie met ons samenwerkt weet: we zijn een team. We kiezen onze partners zorgvuldig en steken veel energie in een band voor de lange termijn. Geluk zit hem in de kleine dingen en daarom streven we altijd naar kwaliteit. Niet alleen in onze fashion, maar ook in service en contact.

Onze naam - Wetenschappelijk Instituut voor het CDA (WI) - verraadt een belangrijk deel van onze doelstelling. Het woordje ‚Äúvoor‚Äù is uitdrukking van een dienstbare opstelling; het WI wil voor alles dienstbaar zijn aan christendemocraten en christendemocratische bestuurders en politici in de praktijk van alledag. 

Het Wetenschappelijk Instituut voor het CDA (WI) is als onafhankelijke denktank verbonden aan het CDA. We verrichten studies naar politieke vraagstukken die uitstijgen boven de discussies van alledag, in lijn met het christendemocratische gedachtegoed. We ondersteunen en adviseren - gevraagd en ongevraagd - landelijke en lokale CDA-politici. Zo brengen we regelmatig publicaties uit, zoals rapporten en essays, dragen we bij aan verkiezingsprogramma's en adviseren we de landelijke fracties en het partijbestuur. We hebben een eigen kwartaaltijdschrift, Christen Democratische Verkenningen, en organiseren regelmatig symposia en lezingen.

Het WI is onafhankelijk, onbaatzuchtig en onbevangen. Die eigenschappen zijn onderdeel van onze kracht en identiteit. Uiteindelijk kan ons werk alleen op vruchtbare bodem landen als we ons tegelijk realiseren voor wie we ons werk doen. Dat mooie spanningsveld tussen onze onafhankelijkheid en onze verbondenheid met vele christendemocraten koesteren we. Het WI is alleen relevant als de publicaties politiek toepasbaar zijn, zoals het CDA alleen relevant is als zijn beleid rust in een diep doorleefde filosofie over menselijke waardigheid en waardevol samenleven. We willen op dit snijvlak staan en met vereende krachten dienstbaar zijn aan de christendemocratie, aan de politiek en aan de samenleving.

Meer weten? Neem gerust contact met ons op via wi@cda.nl of 070-3424874.

IZY doet er alles aan om samen met jullie een verschil te maken in de vermindering van het gebruik van slecht afbreekbare producten! Laat daarom je plastic flesjes vanaf nu staan, en stap over op het gebruik van IZY producten! Zo kunnen we samen een verschil maken! 

Hoe maakt IZY een verschil?
IZY gebruikt milieu vriendelijke materialen √©n zorgt er voor dat de niet-milieu vriendelijke materialen niet meer/minder gebruikt worden! Dit door daily-use producten aan te bieden, welke de plastic flesjes vervangen en er ook nog eens awesome uit zien!
 
Op je werk, bij het sporten of tijdens een dagje uit, vergeet je IZY niet mee te nemen!

At Molano, we build a sustainable world, one device at a time. As an Amsterdam-based refurbished Apple device wholesaler, Molano reduces the environmental footprint of the smartphone industry by extending the lifespan of Apple hardware. Located in Haarlem, The Netherlands, we‚Äôre setting up reliable supply chains to provide all market segments with the right quality used and refurbished devices.

Extending the lifespan of hardware devices is a matter of ensuring that nothing goes to waste. The proverb ‚Äúone man‚Äôs trash is another man‚Äôs treasure‚Äù exactly describes our vision on each device that enters our grading pipeline. Different buyers have different demands, which sometimes complement each other, sometimes intersect, and sometimes are completely disjoint from one another. Our broad experience with Apple hardware and extensive international network provide us with the essential knowledge in mapping the demands of specific market segments to the classifications produced by our grading methodology. The grading system is fully data-driven using a plethora of metrics - producing a consistent quality in all grades defined by Molano. This ensures the most optimal life cycle of Apple devices, so that each device is eventually directed to the right buyer.

Building out on our core business, Molano contributes towards a flourishing circular economy with our full-service repair and grading facility (planned 2022). A unified service and distribution point for any customer demand - from retailers and repair shops to wholesalers and corporations, our facility functions as the hub that distributes and redistributes Apple devices. Devices go in and go out, and in each cycle are subjected to our thorough grading processes. The returns of one buyer might often serve the demand of another, delaying the retirement of a device as long as possible, and eventually decommissioning it into parts  and eventually decommissioning it into parts and raw materials suitable for recycling.

Good healthcare, a strong economy in The Hague with 10,000 new jobs and residents of The Hague who decide for themselves about their neighbourhood. That's what we go for!

Our dream is to bring art, stories and culture closer together through fashion and to give young artists a platform to showcase their talent. Our fashions detail printed art along with non-printed items that have translated the art story through the use of design, colour, high quality and natural fabrics.

 

We are passionate about making a difference and in partnering with others who feel the same. We work hard to deliver responsible business practices and partner with like-minded suppliers. Relationships are of utmost importance to us.

 

One of our greatest loves is for our South African upliftment program with a percentage of our turnover going into the Rhumaa Foundation. Here, we support projects and skills development programs in the under-developed communities of Cape Town that help young artists build creative skills that support them with job opportunities.

Ready to wear womenswear brand focused on designing clothes that are equally fashionable and kind to our environment.

We embrace the environment

Our clothes are made in European Union countries and we source all our certified organic fabrics from renowned textile producers within EU. By having our production cycle within Europe, we are able to significantly cut down on carbon footprint.
Our suppliers are committed to reduce their energy and water consumption at every stage of the production cycle. For our spring-summer collections, we predominantly use¬†naturally coloured linens and cottons, known for their environmentally friendly features.¬†For autumn-winter collections, we source organic cottons and wools,¬†carefully harvested in consideration of the sheep‚Äôs wellbeing.

We take care of each other¬†

Since the beginning of KAN, we have worked closely with the amazing people who make our garments. Employing only fairly paid labour has always been of paramount importance to us. Our production partners are located in Europe, and we make sure they have safe working conditions and a healthy balance between their lives inside and outside the production facilities.

We are all about upcycling and no overproduction

We make two collections a year and we are always cautions to avoid overproduction. For our B2B customers, we produce exactly the amounts they order, during the sales seasons. For our B2C strategy, with time, we have become better and better at predicting our sales per collection. We keep a safe inventory every collection and constantly replenish the inventory depending on customer demand. 

It is only the beginning of our sustainability journey¬†

We are aware of our social and environmental responsibility and keep educating and challenging ourselves to set the bar higher with each collection we create. With online, professional and personal lives becoming increasingly entwined, it‚Äôs never been more important for web users to take security and privacy seriously. Whether working remotely with client information, completing financial transactions or sending photos to loved ones, a user‚Äôs safest bet is to transmit information using protection. Keezel is making the internet more secure and private by offering a solution that consumers, employees, IT and compliance managers love.

The Keezel (keezel.co) is a revolutionary portable security device that protects all your devices on any WiFi network (coffee shop, hotel, airport or at home) with strong encryption, ad blocking and anti phishing protection. Keezel ran and fulfilled a very successful (USD $1.1 million) Indiegogo campaign. The product is in mass production and in retail. Happy customers are using Keezel in 125+ countries. Keezel sells a hardware & software combination, with services through recurring monthly subscription to consumers and businesses. Keezel is based in Amsterdam (NL) and Newport Beach, CA (USA) and always looking for talented additions to the team!

Amsterdam based fashion startup, producing and selling our first line of clothing for women in 2020.

Founded in 2013 in Amsterdam, Cevelann ¬Æ is a convergence of childhood memories of being wrapped up in the softest cotton and of inspiring travel stories. These memories, along with a passion to live consciously and preserve the art of real craftsmanship, have shaped our brand of exquisite home d√©cor and travel accessories.  We believe it is important to offer products made of the finest quality materials that can stand the test of time, products with a character and soul, living diaries you can continue to turn the pages of as you wander the world.

In keeping with this spirit, we design our products in Amsterdam and work directly with the last family businesses in the Mediterranean that still continue the traditional techniques of weaving. We work with local farmers based in Europe who are active participants of the sustainability programmes that promote cleaner and healthier water, soil and natural habitats, as well as workers' well-being. Our Woolmark-certified wool collection embodies yarns exclusively sourced from suppliers with mulesing-free farming practices. As we bring together premium raw materials sustainably sourced in Europe, dozens of amazing people contribute to the realisation of a single product. It is truly an honour to be part of this creative process. Our artisans and craftsmen are passionate about their work and share our intention to have a positive impact on the environment.

We invite you on our journey with our artisans to explore Softness and Soul.

In de Zuid- Afrikaanse keuken wordt veelal met macadamia olie gekookt. Dat doen ze vanwege de romige en boterachtige smaak, de vele vitaminen en mineralen dat het bevat en het feit dat deze olie een hoger kookpunt heeft dan de meeste oli√´n. Dat is erg belangrijk, want daardoor blijven alle vitaminen en mineralen behouden tijdens het koken. White River brengt deze lekkere en vooral gezonde olie graag naar jouw keuken!

Zuid-Afrika is een belangrijke producent van de wereldwijde macadamia markt. Deze wereldmarkt is echter een harde en strikte wereld, wat betekent dat Afrikaanse boeren niet al hun voorraden kunnen verkopen. White River koopt juist deze onverkoopbare voorraad op en zorgt er zo voor dat er geen overschotten achterblijven. Hier valt namelijk nog prachtige olie van te maken. Ook is er een financieel voordeel voor de lokale boeren; ze kunnen all hun producten verkopen en hoeven niks te vernietigen.

Mijn allerliefste vrouw (https://www.linkedin.com/in/kimkeijzer/) heeft de eerste stap vorig jaar gezet en haar bedrijf verkocht. PARO STORE helps you discover emerging designers who are driving the fashion industry towards a sustainable future. The industry behind the clothing we wear is one of the most damaging to the planet, and we don‚Äôt want to stand for the status quo. We only stock independent brands who design and produce awesome clothing in a way that‚Äôs better for people and our planet. Good design, that‚Äôs good for the world.

Overview
Vision

Our aim is to be able to offer a range of high quality leather goods, made from genuine good quality leather, at very affordable prices. Initially we will be selling horse riding bits and pieces ‚Äì specifically bridles using Swarovski crystals, wallets for both men and women, belts, laptop and office bags and laptop sleeves. Later, I hope to be able to add to this product range with a selection of quality jackets and other leather fashion accessories. Our ultimate goal is to serve you based on model "your preferences, our products"‚Äã.

Our ethics

We believe in the diversity and equal rights of our affiliates. That‚Äôs why we chose to partner with an atelier that fights child labor and offers exceptional working conditions. We personally vet and verify these conditions by frequent visits to the factories. This also allows us to maintain a trusted relationship with our teams.

Our story

BLUCACTUS was born out of the unconditional love between parents and his son. The story began in India when I decided to leave my home country and travel to Europe. My parents wanted to encapsulate their relationship, so they decided to personally design and make a leather jacket for me. This touching gesture motivated me to share this gift and create unique pieces of leather at affordable prices for all to enjoy. Always inspired by my roots, I wanted to pay tribute to my Indian culture through some of my collections. Like the cactus, all the designs are full of character, durable, and long-lasting.

Your Vision, our products

Firma van Buiten is een leer-werkbedrijf waarbij we werken in de catering en productiewerk doen voor horeca-bedrijven. Bij ons werken mensen met een afstand tot de arbeidsmarkt. We begeleiden mensen met een WWB uitkering van de Gemeente Delft, een PGB budget, een WAJONG uitkering, schoolstagiairs van veelal praktijkscholen, mensen met een taakstraf vanuit de Reclassering en diverse vrijwilligers. Alle deelnemers hebben bij Firma van Buiten een leer-werkplek om weer een stukje dichter bij de reguliere arbeidsmarkt te komen. We streven ernaar om de afstand naar de arbeidsmarkt een stuk kleiner te maken. De deelnemers doen veel werkervaring op de werkvloer, maar volgen ook lessen intern in de basisvaardigheden van de horeca. Zo is er les in de hygi√´necode HACCP, warenkennis en snijtechnieken. Daarnaast proberen we ook zoveel mogelijk stages te cre√´ren bij reguliere bedrijven om deelnemers ervaring op te laten doen met de steun en begeleiding. Firma van Buiten probeert de deelnemers te laten groeien in eigen kunnen. We streven er naar om mensen altijd weer dichter naar de reguliere arbeidsmarkt te laten komen. Maar daarnaast ook een leerzame plek te zijn voor de deelnemer die rust en regelmaat nodig heeft om te kunnen groeien naar de volgende stap. Bij Firma van Buiten doen we alle soorten cateringopdrachten, van de appeltaart voor Oma haar verjaardag tot een diner voor 500 personen voor een zakelijk netwerk-event.

De avonturen van Maas. Maas is een ongelooflijk sterke jongen (geboren in 2013) die zijn ervaring met kanker omzet in een hartewens: een magisch medicijn voor kinderen met kanker.

Stichting Maas werft fondsen op diverse manieren:
* Het prentenboek ‚ÄúDe avonturen van Maas en zijn magische eenhoorn‚Äù wordt verkocht via stichting Maas www.deavonturenvanmaas.nl
* Verkoop van producten die zorgen voor een glimlach en een bijdrage aan het doel van stichting Maas mogelijk maken
* Magische initiatieven met bedrijven die hun maatschappelijke betrokkenheid willen omzetten in een concrete bijdrage. Onder andere spinningmarathons, relatiegeschenken aan klanten en benefietavonden. 
* Duurzame financi√´le bijdragen van bedrijven en mooie mensen. Stichting Maas is een officieel goed doel met een ANBI-status, waardoor doneren fiscaal aantrekkelijk is.

La Ligna bestaat sinds 1984 en is een positief en energiek merk van Nederlandse bodem dat kleur toevoegt aan het leven van de Nederlandse vrouw. Naast de 42 winkels, verspreid over heel Nederland, heeft La Ligna ook een webshop waar je alle artikelen uit de collectie kunt bestellen. De bestelde kleding kan worden opgehaald bij een vestiging in de buurt, maar natuurlijk ook thuis worden bezorgd.

Gevestigd in de buurt van onze afnemers
We hebben ervoor gekozen onze bakkerij in Den Haag te vestigen, omdat we vanuit daar een groot deel van onze afnemers kunnen bedienen. Op deze manier zijn we minder lang onderweg, dus kunnen we snel leveren. Als de grootte van de bestelling het toelaat bezorgen we op de fiets.

Klein pand, grote afnemers
In 2012 kregen we de kans om een prachtig historisch pand aan de Herengracht te huren van Stadsherstel Den Haag. Deze organisatie zet zich in voor herstel en behoud van het historische karakter van onze mooie stad. Zij kopen en restaureren bedreigde monumenten en beeldbepalende panden en geven ze een passende bestemming als woon- of werkruimte. Zo bouwt Stadsherstel aan Haags karakter. Al sinds 1977.

Het karakteristieke pand aan de Herengracht is waarvandaan we onze horeca-afnemers bedienen √©n waar we dagelijks vers brood hebben liggen voor iedereen die langskomt.

The story behind new generation luxury label VLIEGER & VANDAM is a story about interdisciplinary design, about the relation between art and fashion, and about innovative craftsmanship. 

Carolien Vlieger and Hein van Dam, trained as graphic designer and industrial designer, respectively, started the VLIEGER & VANDAM label in 2004 in response to the overwhelming success of their collaboration in 2002. This collaboration named ‚ÄòThe Guardian Angel Handbag‚Äô was a comment from both designers on all the media attention to street violence in the city of Rotterdam, the place where they had just settled. Those early Guardian Angels were assembled with parts from second hand handbags and new brightly coloured felt embossed with distinct profiles. A handbag turned out to be the perfect vehicle for an international widely felt and far from salon f√§hig sentiment. In 2005 the Guardian Angel Handbags were featured in the exhibition SAFE: Design Takes on Risk at MoMA in New York, where they have been part of the collection ever since. 

Over the past decade the VLIEGER & VANDAM collections have seen many more bestsellers such as the Handcuffs clutch and hand painted Splash accessories. The label distinguishes itself with outspoken interdisciplinary design and innovative embossing techniques using the most luxurious leather qualities by Dutch and Italian tanneries. All bags and accessories are made in specialised leather workshops in Europe. New generation luxury means a traditional high end quality and craftsmanship, but with statement design as an added value in stead of conventional luxury industry branding.

VLIEGER & VANDAM is sold around the world at design and concept stores and in the finest department stores such as: Harvey Nichols Dubai and Hong Kong, IT Hong Kong and Shanghai, Galeries Lafayette Beijing, LUISAVIAROMA Florence, Wall Tokyo, Chuckies New York and at Gregory‚Äôs in Fred Segal, Los Angeles.
Creative studio based in Amsterdam, Europe.

At DemarkQ, our mission is to use LED light technology to provide safe and effective solutions for teenage acne. We combine non-invasive acne treatments with a skin positive approach to pave the way to universal beauty acceptance.

Acne is a common skin affliction that affects many teenagers and adults. It is a skin condition that requires evidence-based treatment and care. However, the shame surrounding it makes us feel like our acne is an indicator of our beauty, hygiene, and self-worth. It is not. 

That‚Äôs why it‚Äôs time to shine a light on acne (literally) to treat the condition AND the stigma surrounding it. 

What drives us?

We‚Äôre passionate about acne as a whole:
We care. A LOT. Our products are made to not only add value to your skincare routine but also your sense of self. Healing acne is just a small part of the stigma that surrounds it and we are willing to change that. 

We have fun:
We hope we can be a reminder that life is much bigger than your skin. Your skin texture doesn‚Äôt define your worth and so shouldn‚Äôt stop you from enjoying your life.

We‚Äôre reliable:
We‚Äôve taken every step to ensure you and your skin get the best possible care. We‚Äôve paid close attention to both the efficacy and safety of our devices so you don‚Äôt have to worry about that.  

We tell the truth:
It‚Äôs simple. If we don‚Äôt believe in it, we don‚Äôt sell it. Our products are made to work. 

We‚Äôre not afraid to take the lead: 
We‚Äôre not afraid to go against industry standards(or any standard really) on what it means to be beautiful. This is reflected in our ads, images, and everything else. 

We invite change:
Progress is our middle name. We believe in constant innovation is crucial to shaping a better tomorrow. So, we‚Äôre never afraid to ask the question, can we do better? 

Have more questions?

We‚Äôre always happy to hear from you! Do you want to learn more about DemarkQ or our products. Send us a message: marketing@demarkq.com

NO MESS, NO DRIPS, NO SPOON 

As a young entrepreneurial start-up in 2008, we developed T-Sticks to initially solve a messy problem and allow businesses and consumers to save time and costs within high footfall HORECA environments, especially within offices, events and conferences across airliners, cruise liners and trains. Our message is simple: ‚Äòmake life easier‚Äô. 

What are T-Sticks? A ready-to-brew infuser stick made with finely selected leaf tea from around the world. A premium alternative to tea bags and loose leaf tea. 

T-Sticks solve a genuine problem and our tagline sums it up simply: 

No mess 
No drips 
No spoon 

Making a cup of tea has never been so easy. 


We make our tea a little different. In fact, we‚Äôve done away with the teabag entirely. 

With T-Sticks, you can enjoy your tea when you‚Äôre on the go because there‚Äôs no need for a teaspoon, which means no mess. 

More importantly, T-Sticks are made from proper leaf tea with all the good stuff like antioxidants and no tea dust like regular teabags. 

How It Works 
Place your T-Stick into a cup of freshly boiled water. Stir the T-Stick and give it optimal time to infuse. We recommend a minimum of 2 minutes. That‚Äôs it. If you like, add lemon or milk, sugar or honey and enjoy. 


Be Smart

It‚Äôs clever but simple. 427 evenly-spaced micro perforations on each of our T-Sticks, so that tea tannins aren‚Äôt concentrated and our tea never steeps and gets bitter.

The Foil
Ordinary filter paper would absorb the actual tea taste and brewing colloids etc, where as our perforated foil releases the full flavour back into the cup. While paper tea bags may contain noxious substances such as remainders of glues or plant-protective agents like pesticides etc, our perorated foil is manufactured according to EU standards. It is encapsulated with a layer of BOPP which remains stable even up to 121 degrees Celsius.

Ons bedrijf heeft een klantgerichte servicebenadering om haar klanten de beste oplossing te bieden op het gebied van technische ondersteuning, prijs en leveringstermijn.

Hi, welkom!
Mijn naam is Merel Eva Kannegieter en ik ben trotste eigenaresse van La Eva Store. In het dagelijkse leven studeer ik aan de TMO Fashion Business School. Als school het toelaat, ontdek ik graag de wereld en reis ik naar voor mij onbekende plekken. Ik ben iemand die open staat voor het ontdekken van het onbekende en zo ben ik in december 2018 begonnen om mijn dromen te realiseren. Ik heb met behulp van een aantal lieve mensen mijn eigen webshop kunnen opzetten. Door mijn studie heb ik het leven van een jonge ondernemer leren kennen en mijn interesse op het gebied van fashion en lifestyle kunnen ontwikkelen. Ik ben eerst klein begonnen met alleen een Instagram account. Al snel kwam ik er achter dat ik dit ontzettend tof vind om te doen waardoor ik de drive heb gevonden om het groter aan te pakken. Ik ben trots om te zien dat een klein idee uitgegroeid is tot een heel mooi resultaat.

Met La Eva Store wil ik laten zien dat basis accessoires ook heel fashionable kunnen zijn en makkelijk te combineren met elke outfit. Om in een land met een overweldigend aanbod van kleding en accessoires op te blijven vallen, pak ik het net even iets anders aan. Het is voor mij belangrijk dat mijn producten toegankelijk zijn voor iedereen en jij als bezoeker, je aangesproken voelt tot de verschillende producten. Laat je inspireren door het aanbod die ik dagelijks zelf selecteer en bekijk mijn collectie!

Liefs, Merel

Wij bij Ted Louise geloven dat alles mogelijk is. Met onze tassen versterken wij je bij iedere stap die je zet, zowel zakelijk als priv√©. Ted Louise staat voor een georganiseerde tas van het meest hoogwaardig kwaliteitsleer full grain leer. De tassen zijn elegant, gedurfd en gekenmerkt met een classy uitstraling en een fashion twist. It‚Äôs all in the details! Ted Louise is meer dan een tas voor haar klant. Ted Louise is een merk waar haar klant zich door gesterkt voelt en waarmee ze zich identificeert.

Ted Louise versterkt vrouwen bij het najagen van hun dromen. Ambitie, gedurfdheid, elegantie en organisatie zit in ons DNA. Jouw succes en geluk stellen wij voorop en vormt altijd de basis voor onze ontwerpen.

Ted Louise: gemaakt voor sterke vrouwen, door sterke vrouwen.

At AMSTERDAM CHEESE COMPANY it is our mission to carefully select the best Dutch cheese and bring it to you. We are true Dutch cheese heads who want to share our passion and pride in our country‚Äôs finest product. Our customers are serious gourmets who want the unique taste experience from cheese made where much of the land was re-claimed from wet bogs and marshes.	We are proud of our cheese! We carefully chose cheese makers that embrace the artisanal methods that create a truly unique and flavorful cheese while embracing new technologies that allow for a sustainable and environmentally friendly cheese production facilities. There is no substitute for quality. Come taste the difference. ENJOY!
Mastertools B.V. is a machinery company based out of Wasaweg 29, GRONINGEN, Netherlands.
Don‚Äôt buy more, buy better

Our story begins in New York. There, Penn&Ink N.Y was born. It all started with a muse dressed the American style. A muse who inspired to combine the American sense of basic with the European style. A simple idea that led to many collections and the introduction of our well-known travel quality. Perfect for travelers like us. As travelers, we like to explore the world. We‚Äôve discovered places that gave us inspiration to create more collections. Collections that make you feel strong and at ease at the same time. That have a fantastic feel and fit. Both relaxed and comfortable. Collections we‚Äôve made with love. Love that we pass on to you. Because we work from our hearts. 

Throughout the past ten years we‚Äôve not only focused on our collections. We‚Äôve created a world. A place where you can be yourself. Where you can feel the Penn&Ink DNA. Clothes that are comfortable and cosmopolitan, our own eyewear collections, cookbook, bikes, sports collection, footwear and collabs with Blond Amsterdam. Easy and comfy above all. Where classic is the new cool. A world that reflects who we are and the things we love. Because everything has its own story to tell.

By traveling we get inspired. Inspired to let our world grow. Our stores give you the opportunity to experience this world. Feel the warmth of our family and find the best our collection has to offer. Experience what moves us and makes us grow. How family is at the core of everything we do.

BENZAK is a European denim and lifestyle brand from Amsterdam. Founded over six years ago, BENZAK set out with a strong focus on creating high-quality made-to-last garments. Prioritising craftsmanship and timeless design to transcend trends and seasons. With simplicity, comfortability and utilitarian design at the forefront of the brand, in 2013, we entered the world of artisanal denim and quality goods.

BENZAK was inspired by founder Lennaert's formative years in garment development and production. Fundamentally we are denim developers and style enthusiasts. From the cut to the fabric, stitch count to the trimmings and contemporary styling. Everything about BENZAK comes down to the finer more meaningful details.

Our deep understanding of tradition merges with quality design and meticulous details. Our construction and style methodologies derive from our foundational Japanese influences. We‚Äôre big believers in creating approachable apparel that follows lifestyle instead of fashion. Denim or non-denim, our creative processes are consistently in-line with our beliefs.

As a forward-thinking brand in an ever-changing environment, we naturally illustrate where we are through what we produce; whether this is our content, a collection, exclusive pieces, collaborations or events. Our intuitive behaviour can be seen from the inside out. We've evolved into a fully-fledged lifestyle brand.

TAU COTTON creates timeless wardrobe essentials for men. By combining Premium Quality, Eco- Friendly & Affordable, TAU COTTON is unique in the clothing market. We produce in the same factories as high-end fashion brands with eco-friendly fabrics, and by cutting out the middle men it‚Äôs possible to offer our essential wardrobe pieces at an affordable price. 
And by the way, we are honest and transparent about our pricing and production as well!

Business casual looks for the cool girl that cares. 

Our clothing is made by hand at our social studio in The Hague, the Netherlands where we create beautiful garments made from high quality fabrics with social and environmental awareness.

With people and planet in mind we help you get dressed without leaving that nasty footprint. Guilt-free is the new sexy.

Suitable to be worn from day into evening, getting ready for a day in the office and after work drinks in one go is as easy as unfastening a button (or two).

It's our honest approach to fashion.

MySereena ondergoed heeft een dunne 3-laagse technologie die ervoor zorgt dat je altijd fris, droog en beschermd blijft bij urineverlies, menstruatie of als je zweet op de sportschool.
MySereena is een sustainable alternatief voor maandverband.

companyName: The Mister Sparkles Black Cat Clothing,Apparel and Art

description:
OUR STORY
I believe that no animal should be hurt by making beautiful bags and accessories. That‚Äôs why I‚Äôm very happy all of DENISE ROOBOL‚Äôs products are PETA-approved. Besides the vegan aspect, I wanted to prove that vegan products can be fashionable and trendy. With DENISE ROOBOL, I hope to inspire all woman how easy and nice it can be to wear vegan fashion.

VEGAN MICROFIBRE LEATHER
All of DENISE ROOBOL‚Äôs products are made of vegan Microfiber, a material that is made from pressed fibers. The material has a strong coating, which protects it against sunlight and water.  The combination of Microfiber and the strong coating makes the material superstrong, sustainable and water-resistant.
 
Microfiber is the most high-quality alternative for leather and has the same suppleness and feeling. It‚Äôs not needed to use a spray to protect the material.
Microfiber is available in different thicknesses. Every design has their own different thickness. For a minimalistic design we often choose for a thick material. While thinner material matches perfectly with a more casual look. The thickness of the material says nothing about the quality of the bag, but more about the look and feel of the bag.

ATELIER
The atelier where are the DENISE ROOBOL bags a produced is 3 hours driving from Hong Kong. This atelier is not as large with only 10 to 15 well experienced craftsmen.
The studio is fresh, light and spacious. This atelier in Guangzhou excels in the quality they deliver, every product gets the time and attention to make it look perfect.

Een combinatie van stijl en comfort: daar staat Braceby voor.

Braceby hoopt te inspireren met diverse stijlen. Onze zelfontworpen armbanden worden op professionele wijze geproduceerd. Braceby staat voor toegankelijkheid. Onze armbanden passen om iedere pols en bij elk persoon.
Pure materials go into versatile designs of both style and comfort to experience life in. To empower the 24/7 modern women who dress for themselves.

Chocolaterie Magdalena is opgericht in 2010 door Magdaleen Haverkamp. Met een diploma ambachtelijke chocolatier op zak stort zij zich sindsdien volledig op handgemaakte chocola.

Vanuit het chocolade-atelier en Koffiehuis dat gevestigd is in het prachtige Ludgerusgebouw in Vierakker wordt de chocolade verkocht. De verkoop gaat ook door middel van "chocolade op wielen"‚Äã en is een innovatie dat Magdaleen heeft bedacht tijdens haar opleiding. Een rijdende chocolaterie waarmee week- en warenmarkten worden aangedaan. En jaarlijks bezoekt chocolade op wielen meerdere evenementen. Zoals het landelijk bekende Chocoladefestival in Zutphen.

IN het chocoalde-atelier worden vele soorten bonbons op ambachtelijke wijze en met de hand gemaakt. Er wordt gebruik gemaakt van natuurlijke grondstoffen, dus geen schadelijke conserveringsmiddelen.
In het assortiment is ook gluten- en suikervrije chocolade verkrijgbaar. Een goed advies hierbij is inbegrepen.

Voor de horeca en het midden- en kleinbedrijf heeft Magdaleen een aantal interessante concepten bedacht die de verkoop voor de klant doen bevorderen. Hoe mooi kan het zijn als je iemand anders verwend met chocolade. Ons credo is dan ook, "pure chocolade, voor een pure relatie"‚Äã.

At Tolhuijs we have a different idea about design. We are convinced that waste material has huge value and it deserves a second life, by thinking out the box we came up with solutions that can make this happen. That is why we want to use our innovative and beautiful products to lead awareness and consciousness about sustainability across the globe.

We work hard to be sure that our products are balanced between sustainability, beautiful design and social impact. Sustainability needs beauty, and beauty without positive impact is not fun. Only after reaching a perfect balance we can offer stylish and unique products with amazing stories behind them.

Since the starting we have been ensuring that our raw materials get a completely new function through a simple adjustment. In 2012 our ‚ÄúNewaste‚Äù program was started to pre-cycle waste from major manufacturers, by pre-cycling we take advantage of the hidden value of waste material before it gets recycled. Recycling is good, but only ideal if the material is completely useless.

Our innovative supply chain creates value for the environment because with clever use and reuse of materials, recycling would become less necessary. Therefore, we contribute to extend life of equipment, save unnecessary energy consumption, and maintaining the quality of the material. 

Additionally, we create value for our suppliers because their waste represents a cost for them. They buy on large scale precious and quality material to make their great products, each piece that they throw away remains costly for them and for our environment. That is why it is attractive for manufacturers to be part of our cost advantages because at the same time they can improve their processes in a sustainable way.

We believe in humans and social impact is important for us. That is why we produce in Dutch Prisons and Social Workshops.

We are convinced that we offer more than simply objects; We offer amazing stories embedded into beautiful products.

Sleegers Farm Equipment is a modern, reliable and experienced  partner in Farm Equipment company based in the Netherlands. Our focus lies within the agricultural sector with a primary  focus on the poultry market.

For over 50 years Sleegers Farm Equipment has been a concept within the agricultural business with an excellent service, skilled staff and high quality products. 
From feeding systems to drinking systems and from climate control to poultry housing and feed bins. 

Together with our customers and suppliers we take on a long and fruitful cooperation, as Sleegers Farm Equipment has been doing with many of their customers through the years, from generation to generation!

De BrainTrainerPlus‚Ñ¢ is een systeem dat ouderen met beginnende dementie of Alzheimer helpt het denkvermogen te stimuleren en het geheugen te trainen. Maar dat is niet alles wat het doet. Ouderen die ermee werken voelen zich prettig. Ze hebben het gevoel aansluiting te houden bij het hier-en-nu. Het systeem biedt structuur, doordat het dagelijks ingezet kan worden en een echt onderdeel wordt van de dagbesteding. 

Op het systeem kunnen niet alleen individueel spelletjes en quizzen gespeeld worden, maar kan ook samen met familieleden of mantelzorgers een familieboek of een quiz gemaakt worden. Op die manier wordt het contact tussen de oudere en zijn of haar omgeving een stuk betekenisvoller of makkelijker

At Farmer Gracy, our main aim is to provide UK and EU gardeners with the most exclusive flower bulb and bare-root perennial varieties available. Further, we work hard to be sure our bulbs and plants are cultivated, processed and packed in a sustainable and responsible manner.

The clothing industry is responsible for about 4% of global greenhouse gas emissions. In addition, millions of people work in the clothing industry under poor conditions. Major sports brands keep that world away from their customers, which means that complete transparency is lacking. It was often impossible for Joeri, founder of Marathon.R, to find out which sportswear had been produced sustainably and fairly. He wanted to investigate whether it was feasible to start a sustainable and fair sports brand to change that.

Begeleiding bij ontwikkeling en groei. Bewust 'zijn' in de natuur met een systemische blik om weer dichter bij jezelf te komen. Lichaamsbeweging zonder prestatiedruk in combinatie met ademhaling, cognitieve en mentale coaching in de natuur. Stap voor stap werken aan fysiek, mentaal en emotioneel herstel om in eigen kracht √©n (weer) op de juiste plek te komen staan.
Duizenden opgaven in lijn met Cito. Boeken voor taal en rekenen met duidelijke uitleg. Allemaal spelenderwijs om zo samen fluitend dit schooljaar door te komen!

We as CACHICCI, are one of the largest, independent Fast Fashion organizations within the Benelux.
The company is divided into two separate departments, which work closely together: SALES & PR/MARKETING.
This ultimate combination makes the company exceptional and very powerful.

CACHICCI was founded early 2012. Since, the company has delivered Branding, Marketing, Distribution and Sales for several international companies.
The company has grown extensively over the past years. Representing leading Fast Fashion brands and more than 500 boutiques in the Benelux area.

CACHICCI is the first and only sales and distribution agency that focuses on International Fast Fashion brands. That‚Äôs why we are currently one of the leading fashion distributors within the Benelux.

CACHICCI delivers through a well-developed retail network, powered by a professional network of individuals who are responsible for the prosperity of the company. Each brand is handpicked based on its philosophy and position within the market and closely monitored by our salesteam.

With a strong client-oriented approach, CACHICCI seeks to form a unique bond with each client, while providing effective distribution and efficient service.

The Dutch brand OOZOO Timepieces launched its first collection of timepieces about 20 years ago. Since then, the brand is a big hit almost all over the world. The secret? OOZOO Timepieces are fashion items in every sense of the word. OOZOO does not follow trends, it sets trends. Fashion comes in first place, but obviously it‚Äôs just as important to display the right time‚Ä¶

The past 20 years there are many different collections launched from the original Timepieces until the OOZOO Vintage series and many more. Sophistication and elegance are two key elements of the series.

OOZOO Smartwatches is the latest addition. Let's get digital. The Smartwatches are a unique fashion statement and are comfortable to wear. OOZOO Smartwatches are the smart solution for everyone. 

All OOZOO Timepieces are high quality watches. All straps are high quality genuine leather. OOZOO Timepieces launches 4 new collections each year with a lot of new models, so there is always a model to your liking.
We offer worldwide solutions in CCTV, Fire Prevention, Internet Systems, Anti-Theft Systems and Access Control Systems.

Honbike is a micro-mobility pioneer, here to reinvent e-biking. With teams in China, Japan, Europe, and the USA, Honbike is applying aeronautical, automotive and consumer electronics expertise to e-bike design, engineering, and manufacturing.

Honbike believes e-biking is an entirely new category. As cities adapt to new ways of working and living, micro-mobility is transforming the way people move from A to B. Designed for fun and freedom. Engineered for safety and durability. 

Easy to ride. Easy to live with.

Studio Noos is made out of love for fashion and the lack of it when it comes to mom- and diaper bags. Studio Noos makes beautiful, affordable, handmade bags for your stroller and in different types of fabrics, so there's something for everyone. On your stroller or as a shopping bag, our bags are big enough for every adventure!

Our bags are handmade by a foundation in the Netherlands where people with a distance to the labor market and a love of creating and tailoring have the opportunity to help us with the production.

Shop our handmade bags in our online shop.

Best of Japanese skincare and wellness through a fine selection of natural, organic quality brands. All products are formulated with natural Japanese ingredients, free from animal testing, mostly vegan, and gentle to use for all skin types.

The unique combination of ancient rituals, time-tested natural ingredients, and high-tech innovation makes Japanese beauty best in class. For the sophisticated woman that wants a simple skin routine using natural, no-compromise beauty care. 

We launched in the Netherlands in April 2019, and offer worldwide shipping. 

Sterre Rose Beauty is the exclusive NL distributor for eco-luxury skincare range RUHAKU (certified organic, clean, green, vegan).

We are Ceauture. Premium jeansmakers. On our innovative online platform, we combine creativity and couture with new technology, making it possible for everybody to wear their own pair of jeans in the most comfortable way.

For us diversity is the standard. Nobody is the same. Everybody is unique. In its shape, size, and proportions. Don't buy off-the-peg jeans with standard sizes that don't fit you. Discover the comfort and convenience of our easy-to-use technology, that guarantees you to order a Ceauture jeans that suits you perfectly.

We use a state-of-the art configurator. Made to measure you. Beautifully designed and easy to use on your smartphone and tablet. Measuring your body with a digital and discreet body scanner. This innovative technology is stunningly accurate, making it the ultimate size recommendation tool for your pair of jeans.

But there's more that makes your perfect jeans perfect. Not only the fit, but also the look, the feel, and its sustainability. With quality in the details, and devil in the design. That's the future of fashion. That's Ceauture. That's you! Express yourself in the most comfortable way, and feel supermoxie when you wear your Ceauture jeans.

Jackalo is a line of meticulously constructed, sustainable, and ethical play wear for active kids. Our clothes are comfortable,  look great, and are hand-me-down ready.

We are committed to protecting the environment, so we always use organic and natural textiles and support a circular economy.

Fairshoe is opgezet door broer en zus Joshua (19) en Shekinah (21). Wij zijn begonnen met de droom om de textielindustrie te veranderen, omdat er zoveel mensen met onrecht worden behandelt. De merken die wij verkopen op onze webshop hebben we uitgebreid onderzocht op het gebied van duurzame en hoge kwaliteit materialen, en eerlijke werkomstandigheden voor alle betrokkenen.

We appreciate the hype and respect the culture. But our goal is always to be and feel different. We remove all irrelevant noise, and we cherish pure art. Remove the noise, keep the aesthetic. We care about creative minds more than experience. We want to help fashion starters grow and develop their own aesthetic. We encourage candidates to follow their dreams and taking the necessary steps to get closer to their goals. We strive to offer a work environment which help you grow and develop skills to use in your career. We believe in developing creative skills.

Ons assortiment bestaat uit kwalitatieve, betaalbare, eigentijdse en aansprekende veelal handgemaakte producten.

From the dawn of early reminiscence,  Yvo van Regteren Altena has reveled in the world of scent. Traveling the globe as a lifestyle journalist, he met perfume virtuosi, the world‚Äôs great ‚Äònoses‚Äô, and was privileged to unlock the secrets behind spellbinding scents.  His knowledge and passion is bottled in his dream creation, YVRA 1958.

This original masterwork combines intriguing ingredients: fleur d‚Äôoranger, cedar wood, pepper oil and patchouli. The result is a scent as elegant as it is transparent with a touch more pizzazz than the great classics.
YVRA 1958‚Äôs woodsy-citrus tones offer the perfect start to a hectic day or a liberating antidote after a long trip.
Exclusively made in the Netherlands with massive machines, jewelry designed by twin sisters Roos and Geertje Eek.

A pocket-friendly tool to avoid touching dirty surfaces with your hands.
For everybody who gets sick of germy doorknobs and keypads full of viruses.

Ophenr is a pocket-friendly everyday carrying tool offering you a way to avoid touching contaminated surfaces with your hands. It enables you to open doors, press buttons on keypads or touch screens without being a vehicle for further spreading any virus, bacteria or germs. 

‚ÄúDon't you just hate when someone uses the restroom and then you go use the restroom and the doorknob is wet?!‚Äù

Door handles in areas with many visitor are usually a paradise for bacteria, public handles especially. Currently the world is collectively fighting Covid-19, the corona virus. This situation is impacting the lives of millions of people around the globe, and it has created massive awareness for (personal) hygiene. The approach to tackling coronavirus differs per country but we can say that we all have to play our part in slowing the spread and as to keep ourselves safe. 
Coronavirus is a hardy virus that isn‚Äôt limited to one-on-one human transmission but it‚Äôs capable of lingering on surfaces for a week at the very least. 

As one of the oldest metals ever used copper is a mineral and essential to our everyday live. Copper is a highly effective bacteria and viruses killer. It‚Äôs not harmful to people or the environment. Studies worldwide show that copper and its alloys exhibit impressive antibacterial, antiviral and anti-fungal properties. With routine cleaning there is up to a 90% reduction in the numbers of live bacteria on copper. It even remains effective after repeated recontamination. Copper possesses the antimicrobial properties that we need for preventing and combatting infection.

Disclaimer*
Ophenr is not a medical device or a cure for any disease or pathogen. It‚Äôs an everyday carrying tool to make your life easier and to help you avoid touching contaminated touched surfaces.
Feee x Tiny Art

Roasting on order.

.Het online platform over koken, eten, drinken en alles wat daar bij komt kijken. Harold & Lisette Engelen delen hun passie, kennis en liefde voor voeding graag met jou. Doormiddel van onze kookcolleges brengen wij mensen samen met de meest verbindende factor die er is, namelijk eten. Samen eten en bereiden doet de zintuigen prikkelen. De creativiteit van onze deelnemers wordt op de proef gesteld doormiddel van ons unieke Fun Cooking concept. Niet koken aan de hand van strakke recepturen maar juist proeven en experimenteren. Wij zeggen niet voor niets dat wij de plek zijn waar koken leuk wordt en eten een feestje. Om onze kennis optimaal te kunnen delen en zo veel mogelijk mensen mee te laten genieten hebben wij alles samengebracht op ons platform. Op dit platform delen wij de lekkerste recepten, weetjes en feitjes over eten en drinken en zoeken wij de verdieping op. Door online kennis, offline genieten!

First distilled by the Dutch in the 1600s, our famous golden age, jenever has for centuries inspired bravery in our people. In Amsterdam's 19th century clandestine society, Levwater became a cultivated 'bargoens' term for jenever, stemming from the ancient word 'Lev'; or courage. Building on a long history during which it inspired the British to distill their national pride gin, while trying to emulate the liquid Dutch courage, we bring together historic pride with fresh modern flavours from 21st century Amsterdam and encourage you to be brave.

De missie van SuperBra is het zelfvertrouwen van vrouwen te vergroten door goed zittende lingerie en swimwear. De kernwaarden van SuperBra zijn deskundigheid, kwaliteit, betaalbaarheid, diversiteit en body positivity.

SuperBra wil een BH-revolutie naar Nederland brengen. Veel vrouwen die nog nooit bij SuperBra zijn geweest hebben het idee dat een BH eigenlijk nooit echt comfortabel kan zitten, en voor veel vrouwen is shoppen voor BHs nooit echt leuk. SuperBra doet er alles aan om hier verandering in te brengen!

SuperBra heeft fysieke winkels in Rotterdam en Utrecht een  webwinkel op www.superbra.nl.

House of Chi helps cool products, places and people to reach new audiences and change the world.

We throw groovy beats, beautiful artwork and sacred knowledge in the mix with clever entrepreneurship.

We have our office in Amsterdam. We throw parties all over the country. We can host a full dance stage or create a cozy chill out area. We brew sodas, print banners, build websites and can help to set up a distribution network for your products. We work together with many other organizations and we believe in co-creation.

Are you curious what we can do for your product or event? 

Send us an email: info@houseofchi.nl
Wilt u contact met ons opnemen? Stuur ons een priv√© bericht op LinkedIn, of mail naar: cdakrimpen@gmail.com

Boca's overdag:
Een van de moeilijkste keuzes in een mensenleven: het kiezen van een broodje bij ontbijt of lunch.
Bij Boca's hoef je niet te kiezen. Je bestelt gewoon meerdere kleine broodjes. Een broodplank met broodjes. En heb je dan nog honger, dan bestel je er gewoon nog een paar bij. En wat er dan op zit? Dat bepaal je zelf natuurlijk. Bestellen doe je door op de menukaart aan te vinken waar je zin in hebt.

Boca's borrel en avond:
"Borrel." Het mooiste woord der Nederlandse taal.
Vandaag de dag wint de borrel het steeds vaker van het diner. En wij kunnen dat alleen maar toejuichen.
Echt uit eten gaan voelt namelijk vaak als een verplichting. Net als je lekker aan het borrelen bent, vraagt er iemand: "wat doen we eigenlijk met eten?".

Wij zeggen: doorborrelen. Want bij Boca's kun je borrelen zonder het eten over te slaan. Zelden zijn eten en drinken zo goed in evenwicht. Bij Boca's verheffen we de borrel tot kunst. De late borrel van Boca's biedt genoeg om zelfs de grootste 'foodies' tot zwijgen te brengen. Dit alles verfijnd, op smaak en betaalbaar.

Music All In is in 1980 als kleine platenzaak van 25 m2 begonnen. Inmiddels zijn wij uitgegroeid tot √©√©n van de grote partijen in de Benelux in de muziekinstrumenten markt. Onze winkel is met 8000 m2 √©√©n van de grootste van Europa. Naast de winkel in Noordwijk hebben wij twee online verkoopkanalen, musicallin.nl en kindermuziekwinkel.com.

JUNGL Amsterdam, a brand that produces and designs sustainable swimwear, was founded in 2017. We attach importance to people, the environment and animals. It is quite difficult to always take these aspects into account in daily life, especially in the field of fashion. The fashion industry is environmentally very harmful and clothing is often produced under poor working conditions. JUNGL wants to make a change and has therefore designed and produced swimwear made of fishing nets and other nylon waste. It often surprises people when they hear swimwear can be made out of this. The fabric is soft and strong. By using recycled materials no new raw materials are used. The swimwear is ethically produced in Portugal. The factory is gots and smeta certified which are the highest certifications possible. We will launch our collection soon.

Wij zijn een volkspartij die vanuit het mensbeeld werkt. Zorgen is voor ons naar elkaar omzien; in een gezin, een familie, binnen vriendengroepen, verenigingen en organisaties, op school en in de buurten. Voor elkaar zorgen, helpen en problemen voorkomen. Wij staan voor een (christelijk) mensbeeld. Daarin staat centraal dat je niet alleen voor

Kwaliteit voor alles 
Alle producten voor Senioren worden in Europa geproduceerd, de kern van het programma wordt zelfs in Nederland ontwikkeld en geproduceerd. Secu is aangesloten bij SKG, een onafhankelijke keurings-instelling die niet alleen test op sterkte en langdurige kwaliteit, maar ook periodiek controleert of de producten nog volgens de normeringen worden geproduceerd en of er een adequate klachtenafhandeling is. 

Achtergrond
SecuCare is een merk van SecuProducts BV (Secu). Secu is een oer-hollands familiebedrijf, bestaat al sinds 1987 en is marktleider op het gebied van beveiligings- en veiligheidsproducten aan de DHZ, bouw en de Zorg in Nederland en daarbuiten. One hundred is symbolic for the ultimate number, perfection, and authenticity. This is exactly what BARKI stands for. The new generation that goes for the ultimate and wants to reach the top by being unique and through hard work.
