Toilu biedt 100% katoenen biologische canvassen aan. De biologische canvas tassen van Toilu zullen voorzien zijn van een one line print, met daarnaast ook een fel opvallend label. Nu horen wij u denken wat is een one line? Een one line is naar het Nederlands vertaald "een lijn" dit is ook de kracht van deze teken methode. Er wordt door middel van een lijn uiteindelijk een tekening gemaakt. Een one line zal de tweede keer nooit meer hetzelfde worden. Het verhaal wat Toilu met deze teken methode wilt overbrengen is dat iedereen anders is en mooi is zoals hij/zij is. Binnen Toilu is iedereen gelijk en mooi zoals hij/zij is. Naast dat de tassen dus voorzien zijn van one line tekening en een fel label zijn de tassen van Toilu ook van hoogwaardige materiaal gemaakt. Als laatste zien de tassen ook er ook nog eens modebewust uit, waardoor u er altijd goed bijloopt met een 100% biologische canvas tas van Toilu.

Find your true north
Iedereen heeft een innerlijk kompas dat je succesvol door het leven leidt "your true north". Het is je orientatiepunt, een vast punt in een wereld dat in hoog tempo constant verandert. Het helpt je koers te houden. Het is gebaseerd op wat belangrijk is voor jou, je diepste verlangen, je passie en motivatie om voldoening uit dit leven te halen. In de drukke en stressvolle maatschappij waarin wij leven is het soms moeilijk koers te houden en vast te houden aan hetgeen dat jou blij maakt.

Welkom bij Moon Yoga Club. Wij combineren de eeuwenoude traditie van yoga met de know how van nu. Onze yoga lessen zijn speciaal ontworpen om de energie van het lichaam vrij te laten stromen. Regelmatig worden er events en workshops georganiseerd. Ze zijn mindful, geven inspiratie en helpen je het maximale uit jezelf te halen. Onze activiteiten stemmen we af op de stand van de maan, zodat we de natuurlijke invloed positief kunnen versterken. Je zal krachtiger en positiever in het leven staan. Dit helpt je keuzes te maken die echt bij je passen.

Voor wie?
Of je nu een schrijver bent op zoek naar inspiratie, een entrepreneur die op zoek is naar meer creativiteit, of juist iemand bent die wilt ontdekken waar je enthousiast van wordt en wat je passie is. Het begint allemaal bij goed in je vel zitten en te vertrouwen op je innerlijke kompas - to find your true north.

Onze studio is architectonisch zo ontworpen dat het een oase van rust biedt in drukke, stressvolle levens. De constante toevoer van frisse lucht zorgt dat de studio, gemaakt van natuurlijke materialen, gezonder, zuurstofrijker en schoner is dan welke andere ter wereld.

5thPosition is a collection of swimwear inspired by the strong and graceful silhouettes of dancers. All products are made in hand with fabrics made of plastic wastes collected from oceans.
Named after the most advance and last beginning position of ballet, Istanbul and Amsterdam based brand aims to create silhouettes like dancers‚Äô suits in which women can live all day and move freely.
Born as the daughter of a ballet dancer, the founder of the brand Buse Uƒüur, has started dancing at a very early age. Buse started her dance education in classical ballet, but her free spirit led her to continue with contemporary dance. It was during these years when she first designed and sewed her very own dance suits. Using them as swimwear on beaches, she created her own fan base which eventually inspired the initial idea of the brand.

 In 2014, the first lookbook of the brand was shot with model Ezgi Bozkurt. Also a product designer and interior architectural designer, Ezgi fell in love with the idea of using dance as an inspiration for beachwear and became a good supporter and friend of Buse. This friendship lead to a partnership by the end of 2014. On March 2015, the fellow duo launched their first collection with a runway show on Mercedes Benz Fashion Week Istanbul.

 On its fourth season, 5thPosition swimwear is available on selected boutiques and stores worldwide. The brand is well-known and respected with a strong following, launched two seasons during MBFWI.

We are team Rotterdam_HR 2020, the third iGEM team from the Rotterdam University of Applied Sciences. We are a team with multiple disciplinaries: five Biology and Medical Laboratory research students; one Computer Science student and a student of Industrial Project Design. 

We are developing a low-cost and flexible detection system for health-related real-world problems, the Health Risk Detection kit. This kit will bring a fast and reliable point-of-care testing solution for people who have a need for fast medical testing at home or at the bedside. This will improve health care for many different social groups that depend on home care. Our project will mainly focus on current diseases such as COVID-19, to prevent intensive hospital visits but will also lighten work load for district nurses and midwives in their care of the home-bound.

We are iGEM (The International Genetically Engineered Machine competition) 2020 Amsterdam team. We‚Äôre challenging the current limitations of biotechnology. 

Our solution: We are identifying points in microbial metabolic networks that can be leveraged to couple biotechnological production to microbial growth. This means that microbes are incentivized to keep producing products of interest because it is necessary for their own growth.
      To accomplish this, we are modifying the existing FRUITS algorithm, which
identifies opportunities for growth-coupled production within the metabolic network of a host organism. Traditionally, this algorithm has been limited to native metabolic products, but with our introduction of ‚ÄúForbidden FRUITS‚Äù we will expand this tool to allow for the production of non-native metabolites, products that are not naturally made by a host microbe, and therefore ‚Äòforbidden‚Äô, due to technological limitations. This conceptually means that we are expanding the variety of what we can produce, independent of which microbe is producing it. Salicylic acid made by E. coli? We are on it.

Join our journey :
youtu.be/87vCNwwH_Rk

Or support us: igg.me/at/igem-amsterdam-2020/x/23221179

Our brand offers our customers stylish and relaxed tailoring for anytime wear. Every item represents detailed refinement and luxe silhouettes. Our customers lead busy lives, so we aim to deliver ‚Äòon-the-go‚Äô sophistication in our designs that offer long wear and prolonged quality.

Around 20% of our collections detail printed art stories, with the remainder non-printed items being translated through the use of design, colour, high quality and natural fabrics.

Our dream is to bring art, stories and culture closer together through fashion and to give young artists a platform to showcase their talent.

We are passionate about making a difference and in partnering with others who feel the same. We work hard to deliver responsible business practices and partner with like-minded suppliers. Relationships are of utmost importance to us.

Perhaps our biggest love is for our South African upliftment program with 5% of our turnover going into the Rhumaa Foundation. Wij zijn Workformarketing (WFM): een gloednieuwe club van mensen die keihard werken voor jouw klantliefde. In (online) marketing en communicatie zien we al jarenlang een steeds diepere specialisatie. Workformarketing heeft specialistische kennis over allerlei disciplines, maar op een schaalbare manier: ben jij een startende ondernemer? Bel ons en wij helpen je groeien. Werk je voor een A-merk? Wij helpen je een mooie businesscase neer te zetten. Altijd gedacht vanuit een zinnige strategie die jou resultaat oplevert. Ambachtelijke bakkerij met (web)winkel in Heemskerk. H√©t adres voor brood, banket en bonbons voor de regio IJmond. Bezorgt in Heemskerk, Beverwijk, Velsen-Noord, Uitgeest, Castricum, Assendelft en Akersloot. 

Wim Koelman Brood-Banket-Bonbons bestaat sinds 1983 en werd opgericht door naamgever Wim Koelman. Hij leidde de bakkerswinkel samen met zijn vrouw Mary, eerst aan de Maerten van Heemskerckstraat en sinds 1993 aan het Burgemeester Nielenplein 24-28 in Heemskerk. In 1994 droeg Wim de dagelijkse leiding officieel over aan zoon Sjon Koelman en zijn vrouw Nicole, maar hij bleef bij de zaak betrokken. In 2017 hebben we helaas te vroeg afscheid moeten nemen van onze oprichter. 

Sinds 26 augustus 2009 zijn de banketbakkers van Koelman grondleggers van het Heemskerkse Ezelsoor, Heemskerks eigen gebakje. De eigenwijze delicatesse is een blijvend succes en iedereen mag ze graag trakteren. Er zijn nu ook varianten, zoals het mini-ezelsoor en het Ezelsoor XL en XXL. En soms zijn er specials, bijvoorbeeld rode oren voor Valentijnsdag. Heemskerkse Ezelsoren zijn zo beroemd, dat ze zelfs hun eigen Facebook pagina hebben, met honderden fans tot ver over de gemeentegrenzen.

In maart 2014 heropende de banketbakkerij na een spectaculaire verbouwing. Dankzij het moderne interieur, exterieur en de bijpassende huisstijl, kan de stijlvolle winkel zich meten met de besten. De innovatie heeft zich niet beperkt tot het pand en het logo. Regelmatig verbeteren we bestaande lekkernijen en voegen we mooie producten toe aan ons brede assortiment. Daarbij focussen we altijd op topkwaliteit en ambachtelijkheid, zowel voor brood als banket. En het oog wil ook wat! Kom dus snel langs in onze winkel en zie de keuze met eigen ogen.

De vele diensten die Amazon aanbiedt hebben ze niet zelf uitgevonden. Maar wat Amazon simpelweg ver boven de rest doet uitsteken is dat ze alle diensten versimpelen en verbeteren. Zo ook het verkoopproces via het Amazon platform, waarover ik je graag meer vertel.

Wie Amazon maar een klein beetje heeft gevolgd de afgelopen jaren is het niet ontgaan dat het bedrijf enorm aan het uitbreiden is. Wat begon in een garage in Seattle (WA, USA) is in no-time uitgegroeid tot het grootste e-commerce bedrijf in de US met een marktaandeel van meer dan 49%, oftewel 5% van alle retail aankopen. Dit is echt ongekend. Het bedrijf is inmiddels uitgebreid over de gehele wereld en ook in Europa begint Amazon een steeds grotere speler te worden. Ze zijn begonnen met de United Kingdom, Duitsland, Frankrijk, Spanje en Itali√´, maar het ziet er naar uit dat Amazon ook in Nederland (Benelux) binnenkort voet aan de grond zal zetten en de strijd aan zal gaan met grote spelers als Bol.com en Coolblue. Nu is dan ook het ideale moment om je voor te bereiden op deze enorme slag in de e-commerce wereld en expert te worden op het gebied van Amazon.

Er zijn veel dingen die je moet weten om een succesvolle business te krijgen op het platform. Of je nu slechts enkele producten of juist in bulk wilt gaan verkopen. Ik help je graag bij de start van jouw Amazon avontuur!

What started out as a purpose driven festival brand in 2018 has evolved in much more than that. Driven by our purpose, we have become a movement - making real changes in the lives of human beings worldwide. 

Since 2019, incredible humans like you have helped us achieve amazing impact, like providing 520 meals to Orphan kids. And it is leading to bigger and better impact, such as a complete construction of classrooms or creating local jobs in Ghana. 

PURPOSE

It is our purpose to make the world a better place. This is why we work with local tailors. At the moment, we are collaborating with local teams of tailors in Ghana, Gambia, Guinea, Senegal, Kenya and South-Africa. As such, we make agreements with our local tailors to pay them a fair hourly wage for every item they design for us. By doing so, we offer them a platform to pursue their dreams, ensure their kids can attend school and secure a basic standard.

APPAREL

Most apparel is hand-crafted in Africa by local tailors. From time to time, we will launch a new collection from Africa to the world - all in line with our exclusivity, sustainability and slow fashion. To guarantee exclusivity, we offer a once off maximum of 50 items per edition. 

VISION

We stands for mutual utility and dream of being beneficial to the entire world. Our ultimate goal is to unite humans, nations and cultures for peace and a sustainable future. We want to make sure all humans in this world will have access and the opportunity to learn and grow. We believe that proper education is the only way to enhance the quality of humans life. In our world, basic needs, education, freedom and happiness are accessible for every single person.

Launched in 2019 as a franchise from Bamboo Bicycle Club in London.  Bamboo Bicycle Club Amersfoort is run by Tim van Woudenberg. Tim himself experienced the excitement of building a bamboo frame from scratch when he went to a workshop in 2016.

The slogan ‚Äòlike no other bike‚Äô says it all.

The workshop is situated in Fabriek aan de Eem, Heliumweg 40, Amersfoort.  Fabriek aan de Eem is a hub with several creative small businesses.

Currently the workshop can train 3 people a time per workshop. 

Aim for the future

A bamboo bicycle for everyone who wants one but build completely by themselves.

The workshops are starting in 2020. We are aiming for a grow model where every year more frames and bicycles will be build than the year before.  Where will it end? No idea.  We will see how it develops. And lets be honest that is the best way to view the future.

The workshops are not the only aim.  Together with the owners of the bamboo bicycles, we hope to organize social events and Bamboo Bicycle rides.  Everyone in bicycle gear of the Bamboo Bicycle Club, what a wonderful aim.

In 2016 Tim discovered in the design museum in London a brilliant aero race bicycle.  The bicycle appeared to be made from bamboo and designed by the Bamboo Bicycle Club.  By the bicycle there was further information about the Bamboo Bicycle Club.  It explained that you could go and build your own frame from bamboo during their weekend workshops.

As Tim is madly enthusiastic about different types of bicycles it was immediately clear that he himself would attend a workshop to build a frame from bamboo. During this workshop he build his own first frame from bamboo under the guidance of James.

Carry forward to 2019.  By pure co-incidence Tim got back in touch with James and both decided that there was a place in Holland to start a Bamboo Bicycle Club.  This is the start of the Bamboo Bicycle club Amersfoort

Sinds 2018 worden borstimplantaten met een ruw oppervlak (BIOCELL/Natrelle/McGhan) van Allergan geweerd van de Europese markt. Niettemin lopen nog tienduizenden vrouwen in Nederlands rond met deze implantaten. Explantatie wordt meestal niet vergoed door de verzekeraar en schadevergoeding wordt niet aangeboden. Daarom hebben experts en ons platform CalmYourTits de krachten gebundeld om een collectief te vormen. 

Het collectief vordert explantatiekosten en schadevergoeding van fabrikant Allergan. Lees meer op onze website: https://calmyourtits.nl

T-shirts are the main focus. All are made from 100% cotton. All modified shirts are unique, the base shirts come exclusively via second(-plus)-hand means. All have been either previously worn and/or owned by one or more people somewhere in this world. 

Some are unworn and new, some have been worn and washed numerous times. Possibly a shirt bought on holiday or acquired as a freebie somewhere and worn once or twice or a beloved shirt washed over & over that was sold off for whatever reason ‚Ä¶. and so on. 

Each shirt has its own secret history we will never fully know.

NNNN digs these up and up-cycles the shit out of them into new, hopefully cherished little works of ‚Äúart‚Äù masquerading as simple t-shirts. Lots and lots of crisis-inducing work, blood, tears, sweat and love go into each shirt! That said.. I still like to keep things ‚Äúaffordable‚Äù.. at least for now. 

NNNN Modifications is a clothing brand by John Fanning in fabulous Den Haag (The Hague), The Netherlands.

iGEM is an international biotech competition dedicated to the advancement of synthetic biology, education, and the development of an open academic community, bringing students from a wide range of disciplines and backgrounds together. Teams from all over the world set up their own research with the aim to develop novel genetic based solutions to social problems. This year‚Äôs Utrecht team is developing an innovative method for detection of emerging contaminants in surface waters damaging aquatic life, environment, and human health. We will achieve our goal through specific customizations of the detection machinery of bacteria by the implementation of genetically engineered machines.

Wij zijn Mike Bosman en Lars Brakel a.k.a. de Zwembadmannetjes. En wij weten (bijna) alles over zwembaden voor in de tuin. Weten we iets niet? Dan kennen we iemand die het wel weet.

Genieten van je zwembad is geen probleem, maar zorgeloos genieten is een √©chte uitdaging. En wij helpen je hier graag bij. We hebben twee bijzonder nuttige websites voor je gemaakt: zwembadmannetjes.nl - daar zit je nu op - voor alle tips en tricks voor de aanschaf, het onderhoud en de reiniging van je zwembad. Daarnaast hebben we webshop.zwembadmannetjes.nl voor alle producten om zorgeloos te genieten. 

Ook zijn we natuurlijk te vinden op social media. We delen onze kennis regelmatig op Instagram en Facebook. 

Daarnaast sturen we ook soms e-mails naar de zwembadliefhebbers die niet van verassingen houden. Zo informeren we je bijvoorbeeld ruim van te voren als er onweer aan komt. En leggen uit wat je dan met je zwembad moet doen. Dit kan namelijk behoorlijk invloed hebben op de hoeveelheid chloor in je zwembad. Uiteraard sturen we nooit spam ;)

Ook kan je bij ons terecht als je nog geen zwembad hebt en er eentje wil aanschaffen. Misschien kan de blog over verschillende soorten zwembaden je helpen bij je keuze. Is deze niet geschikt? We hebben nog veel meer blogs over zwembaden.

Kortom wij helpen je graag het maximale uit je zwembad te halen of je die nou al aangeschaft hebt of niet.

CDA Someren zet zich in voor het gezamenlijke welzijn van alle inwoners van Lierop, Someren-Dorp, Someren-Eind en Someren-Heide.

Onze visie is gebaseerd op een duurzame maatschappelijke behoefte om Someren voor iedereen leefbaar, veilig en goed verzorgd te krijgen.

Leefbaar betekent een groeigemeente met prima algemene voorzieningen die aansluiten bij de behoeftes, goed onderwijs, passende zorg, een bloeiend verenigingsleven, bruisende centra en brede recreatiemogelijkheden!

Veilig betekent dat criminaliteit en strafbaar gedrag onder controle is en inwoners het belang inzien van een schone omgeving. Dat mensen prettig wonen ten behoeve van het persoonlijke welzijn en oog hebben voor elkaar.

Verzorgd betekent dat maatschappelijke (burger)initiatieven en investeringen door ondernemers gestimuleerd worden. Dat inwoners staan voor hun mening en vrijwilligers en mantelzorgers ondersteund worden.

CDA Someren werkt en denkt vanuit vijf kernwaarden:

     1. Respectvol                                         heb aandacht voor elkaar
     2. Eerlijkheid                                          sta voor wat je zegt
     3. In verbinding                                     werk samen en luister
     4. Verantwoordelijkheid                      ben zelfredzaam
     5. Vooruitstrevend                               denk realistisch en vernieuwend

CDA Someren staat een betrouwbare, integere en sterke gemeente voor die zichzelf op basis van zelfreflectie continu ontwikkelt. Die consequent handelt, serieus luistert, uitgaven afweegt en beloftes nakomt!

     We gaan uit van onze eigen kracht.
                 We bouwen samen aan de toekomst.
                             We hebben ons proces zelf in de hand!

The Tankfreund is a clever helper for always picking the right fuel for your car. It brings protection for yourself and your car of unnecessary damage and expensive repairs. 

Picking the wrong fuel for your car is unfortunately very simple. It takes only a moment of distraction, you go for the wrong fuel pump and the tank is filled with petrol instead of the desired diesel. The consequences are very expensive: towing, emptying and cleaning the entire fuel system can cost from 500 Euros - if you immediately realise the mistake - to many 1.000s of Euros if you start the engine with the wrong fuel.

European automobile clubs are being called thousands of times every year by drivers that picked the wrong fuel (the British automobile club AA alone states 150.000 times a year). However, generally automobile club memberships or car insurances do not cover the costs of resulting damage to the car and other consequences. The driver usually needs to cover the cost of misfuelling.

The Case Club is a luxury bespoke leather goods brand.

Our cases exist of the highest quality materials available. The process of creating your phone case is done with the greatest eye for detail as we start with cutting our leather skins into the shape of the phone case. After that, we visually inspect the finished phone case again and once it meets all our requirements, we make it ready for purchase to our customers. 
Once our cases get picked out and personalized by our customers, we hot stamp their initials into the case with the selected color of foil. Once the case is finished, we wrap them into our signature black boxes, making it ready to become exclusively yours.

With the beautiful designs the newest phones have, there should only be a case applied to it that compliments the device even further. This is where we step in. The Case Club takes the ‚Äòmust‚Äô out of applying a phone case and transforms it to a ‚Äòwant‚Äô. Protecting your phone was never this elegant. We offer our customers the freedom to personalize their phone case because we truly believe that everybody should be able to put their name out to the world. What better way to do this than through a case for the device we use the most during our day?

CORQE is a boutique developer of top-performing, environmentally-conscientious, sustainable sports products.  We have a unique vision and focus on utilizing natural materials derived from the earth with emphasis on quality, design and performance.


CORQE¬Æ / Corporate Responsibility 

It is said that we all leave a footprint on the environment and we have to do our part to make a positive impact, which is why we focus on minimizing waste during the production process of our products; from recycling unused materials, reducing energy consumption to using natural fibers and recycled materials. 

It is important for us to be known as a socially responsible brand.  Known to create durable, quality, natural products.  Products that bring awareness to our natural surroundings and the vast potential.

Our CORQE ‚ÄòDNA‚Äô stretches beyond our products. It‚Äôs reflected in our philosophy, commitment and responsibility to preserving the planet.


CORQE¬Æ / Sustainable Sport Products

Our natural cork golf grips are handcrafted here in Portugal, cork country of the world. These unique, beautifully designed grips are a perfect alternative to rubber grips.  With its natural feel and touch, creating an innate bond between you and the club, it will stimulate an instinctual stroke in your game.

With our passion on quality and design as a dominant factor in our mission, it‚Äôs been a treat for us to see advanced technology combined with the passion of old-world craftsmanship to create our CORQE Grip.

Yammeya is all about charity, helping African farmers, having fun and producing the highest quality elegant clothing.

STORY

When my brother and I were young, our mother sometimes used to dress us similarly... same shirts, pants, and shoes. We always fought when that happened, and I still hate him for leaving permanent marks on my arms! ü§£

The pictures I have from those days are my childhood treasures. Once again, we are using clothing and designs to connect with each other. Although the specifics are different, the spirit remains the same.

Instead of aiming solely for profits, we would like Yammeya‚Äôs products to instill a sense of community and fraternity into our customers. These are the foundations of society, and we would like to reignite the fun in meeting and socializing.

Along with that, Yammeya is committed to the environment. In The Yammeya Charity Program, we have partnered with Trees for the Future to help combat deforestation. By buying at Yammeya, you‚Äôll be proudly contributing towards improving the climate and livelihood of countries in the African continent where Trees for the Future operates.

Zand-erover designs eco-friendly leather bags and accessories inspired by the graphic forms and hues of nature. This inspiration gives an extra dimension to our outstanding and minimal designs. All items are handmade in order to create a unique, tailor-made product. The brand believes in slow fashion. Therefore all of our products are strong, waterproof, long lasting and liked to be used for years, instead of one season. Over time the products adapt to your life by its contemporary design and the ability of leather to live and change when used.

All products are designed and developed in the Netherlands. For material and production we get a little help of Germany and Poland. This way the production stays within Europe and minimalize transport and fuel. Zand-erover is 100% fairtrade, but that goes without saying.

We are an eco-friendly brand and try to be kind to nature in every way. All materials are carefully selected on a sustainable origin. We see leather as one of nature‚Äôs most beautiful and durable products: it lasts more than a lifetime and is therefore sustainable and eco-friendly. The finest European leather is tanned with as less water and energy as possible to minimalize the impact on environment.

So far there hasn‚Äôt been found a more eco-friendly (or even vegan) alternative for leather on the market that suite the demands of Zand-erover regarding high quality and lasting products. However, we are very eager to find new solutions to improve its products and the world around.

Zand-erover was founded in Amsterdam, the Netherlands in 2013 by Dutch designer Sandy Visser. Her love for nature and design reflects the handmade and typical minimal designs. Together with her sister Shelly they form the heart of the brand.

D√©borah obtained the highest diploma of the world‚Äôs most renowned institute for wine education, the Wine & Spirit Education Trust (WSET), in 2014 and became a Weinakademiker at the Weinakademie √ñsterreich in 2015 with her thesis ‚ÄòGrower Champagne; a new and lasting reality?‚Äô. 

Joris was an attorney at law for 10 years before he - guided by his infatuation with wine -  set a new course in 2014. He has obtained the WSET Advanced diploma (with merit) and likes to read and study everything there is on wine. Au Paradis is an expression of their shared passion for wine.

Our goals 

Wij willen jou inspireren en ervoor zorgen dat jij de beste versie van jezelf kan zijn. Zelf hadden wij behoefte aan een boutique die onze stijl representeert. Maar wie kan het beter dan wijzelf? De eigenaar van Het hele plaatje, Merel, is orthomoleculair adviseur en coach. Na jaren lang zelf heftige gezondheidsklachten te hebben is zij op het pad van de orthomoleculaire therapie gekomen en dit heeft haar leven veranderd. Haar klachten waren 'te vaag' voor de reguliere geneeskunde, maar dankzij de focus op voeding, suppletie, lifestyle en beweging is zij van haar klachten af! 
Heb jij ook last van vage (hormonale) klachten en zie je door de bomen het bos niet meer? Hoor je van iedereen dat 'je er maar gewoon mee moeten leren leven'? Merel is hier om jou te vertellen dat dat niet hoeft! Je kan zoveel bereiken door: de juiste voeding voor jouw unieke lichaam te kiezen, voedingstekorten aan te vullen, intoleranties te achterhalen, hormoonproof te bewegen en jouw levensstijl omgooien, zodat jij het allerbeste voor jezelf kan zorgen. Merel kijkt naar alle aspecten en alle mogelijke oorzaken van jouw klachten: fysiek en mentaal. Wil je samen met haar kijken naar het hele plaatje? Stuur dan gerust een berichtje, mailtje of bezoek de website. Ze helpt je met alle liefde!

Nobody knows exactly what Phing-Things are and where they come from. Some people think they come from the stars, why else would they always have a star somewhere on their body? Or‚Ä¶‚Ä¶


How it started‚Ä¶.

Phing-Things are created by Gert-Jan Vlaming, a dutch artist. He saw with amazement what this little statue does. The reactions that people had when they saw the Phing-Things for the first time was an inspiring moment for him. The Phing-Thing is able to make people feel happy. Phing-Things are meant to ‚Äòspread happiness‚Äô.

The concept of spreading happiness is a very simple mission statement with such a powerful effect when achieved. This is about trying to bring a moment of joy to a strangers life. Everybody reacts in a different way and every interaction is an opportunity to spread that happiness a little further.

Everything done fair‚Ä¶.

It is important that everything around the Phing-Things is done in a fair and honest way. Spreading happiness start in the way the are made. For the white plaster based Phing-Things, we work with a variety of community based organisations in Holland who create paid work for disabled people for whom it is difficult to find a regular job. Wooden Phing-Things are produced on a fair trade basis on the beautiful island of Bali from Pinas wood which is common on the island. We are also working towards having Phing-things made from recycled plastic to getting rid of the plastic soup and clean up the oceans.

Ontstaan uit noodzaak en gedreven door passie
Calmzy is opgericht door persoonlijke ervaring met slecht slapen

Slapen is een dingetje. Niet alleen voor mij, maar wereldwijd voor ontzettend veel mensen. Door dagelijkse drukte en hectiek is het soms lastig om mijn hoofd rust te geven. Dat komt vooral ‚Äôs avonds in bed tot uiting. Het moment wanneer de omgeving stil en donker is en de aandacht zich intern naar je gedachten verplaatst.

Mijn gedachten hebben vele verhalen, maar slaap komt daar niet in voor. Ik heb al veel pogingen gedaan om mijn slaap te verbeteren; medicijnen, therapie√´n, trainingen en mindfulness. Op lange termijn helaas tevergeefs. ADHD speelt een grote rol daarin, maar ik weet dat mensen zonder ADHD er ook last van hebben.

Op een dag lees ik over een verzwaringsdeken. Ik had er nog nooit van gehoord. Het helpt beter te slapen en dieper te slapen. Ik wil graag beter slapen, dus ik bestel een verzwaringsdeken. Ik heb daarna nooit meer hetzelfde geslapen. Waarom heb ik hier nog nooit van gehoord?

k praatte erover met mensen in mijn omgeving. Zij hadden er ook nog nooit van gehoord. Dat moet veranderen dacht ik. Een verzwaringsdeken moet voor iedereen beschikbaar worden. Ik weet immers zelf hoe waardevol dit product in mijn leven is. Ik ben ervan overtuigd dat ik veel mensen kan helpen om beter te slapen.

Mijn naam is Jurgen, en die overtuiging is de reden waarom ik Calmzy opgericht heb. Omdat ik weet dat zoveel mensen graag beter willen slapen. Met dit product bied ik mensen die mogelijkheid. Want ik weet dat mijn leven beter en gezonder wordt wanneer ik goed slaap. Met Calmzy help ik mee aan het verbeteren van de slaap, zodat we met zijn alle gezonder en gelukkiger leven.

Met vriendelijke slaapgroet,
Jurgen

Supergroen was founded in 2009 with the aim to create supergreen solutions that make a positive, sustainable contribution to the world around us. From start to finish, throughout the entire organization, we are dedicated to maximize the green impact of our solutions.

The Supergroen team comprises people who are dedicated to achieve our aim. So please contact us if you are interested in a supergreen solution. We'll gladly help you to save energy and money.

Ontdek Den Haag en haal bij vijf horecazaken wat lekkers. Met de uitgestippelde route, het menu en weetjes over bezienswaardigheden onderweg ga je zelf op pad. Zo heb jij een corona-proof uitje en steun je tegelijkertijd de horeca! Aanmelden kan via onze website. 

De Haagse Horeca Tour als corona-proof personeelsuitje? Aan bedrijven bieden wij de optie om een geheel of gedeeltelijk verzorgde horeca tour cadeau te doen aan het personeel. Miss: 
Used when addressing a younger adult woman. The ‚Äúcrowning‚Äù of a woman.

Uma: 
Woman or mother in various cultures. The universal term for the global Muslim community. 

Miss UMA is a global platform and online retailer dedicated to uplifting the beauty and power of the WOMAN. 
Miss UMA does this by ensuring that our brands and products aren‚Äôt only top of the line, but also adhere to the manufacturing guidelines.
 
Women who practice Islam are often labelled as suppressed or oppressed and are often stereotyped as ones who hide behind ‚Äúscarves‚Äù. In actuality these women come in all shades and from various cultural backgrounds (including the West) and are a symbol of strength and power in their own communities. Miss UMA strives to share the stories of women who‚Äôre mothers, wives and/or successful in business. The most important thing is to show that we‚Äôre not monolithic, instead a diverse power base well worth exploring.

Miss UMA is a one stop shop for information, inspiration, shopping and networking. We plan to help bridge the gap by sharing carefully vetted stories through our blog and products from various corners of the globe.

‚ÄúA poem consists of words and the silence in between‚Äù
(a free interpretation of a Dutch poem - Martinus Nijhoff)

This poem, written on a wall of the local library near my home, touches the core of my inspiration to make jewelry. I only make half-way-there-products, lost without the wearer. I want to capture the silence in between the words in the jewelry I design, but also invite the wearer to do so with their own silence/memories.

My jewelry should be a marriage between art and a utensil. The icing on the cake is the added sentimental value of the piece.

Our mission is not only showing travelers a different side of the Netherlands, but also contributing in issues that Amsterdam is facing with respect to the huge amount of tourists in the city. Being the first in the Netherlands doing this, we collaborate with State Forestry Service (Staatsbosbeheer), a Dutch governmental organization dedicated to strengthen the position of nature in the Netherlands, and offer tours that explore national parks with an official ranger, or kayak a 10 mile route through a national park. 

We do not only offer our tours to travelers directly, but are also available for cruise lines or other tour operators.

Wij zijn Dennis en Marlyn en wij zijn De Hardloop Fabriek. Wat leuk dat je onze webshop bezoekt!

Wij verkopen een uitgebreid accessoires assortiment bestaande uit de volgende fantastisch merken Aonijie, Raidlight en ARCh MAX .

Wij zijn deze webshop begonnen omdat wij vinden dat iedereen die van hardlopen houdt of ermee wilt beginnen, niet meteen heel veel geld kwijt hoeft te zijn aan kwalitatief goede en functionele runninggear. 

Tijdens de voorbereiding voor mijn eerste halve marathon werd goede hardloopgear steeds belangrijker, je neemt immers steeds meer mee voor onderweg. Op de gok een racevest besteld en sindsdien kan ik niet zonder. Ook tijdens langere afstanden had ik hier veel plezier van. Ik kreeg steeds vaker de vraag waar ik dit leuk uitziende racevest vandaan had en zo is het balletje gaan rollen. 

Wil je goede en leuk uitziende hardloopaccessoires, maar wil je er niet al teveel geld aan uitgeven, dan ben je bij ons aan het juiste adres.

Samengevat is onze drijfveer een leuk en bijzonder bedrijf neer te zetten dat kwalitatief uitstekende producten verkoopt. Wellicht dat we in de toekomst nog meer uitbreiding in merkenaanbod gaan aanbieden, met uiteraard de service die jullie van ons mogen verwachten. 

Met sportieve groet, 

De Hardloop Fabriek,                                                                                                                         Voor elke kilometer met gemak!

Sinds 2005 levert Bouly kwalitatief hoogwaardige sticks tegen de laagst mogelijke prijs. Dit is mogelijk door rechtstreeks te importeren vanuit de fabriek waardoor alle kosten van de tussenhandel komen te vervallen. Vandaar dat Bouly niet in winkels leverbaar is. Het streven is en blijft om de sticks tegen 50% goedkoper te zijn ten opzichte van andere hockeyartikelen-aanbieders. Door de grootschalige inkoop en hoge omloopsnelheid kunnen de prijzen laag blijven.

Door het directe contact met de fabrikant kan er rechtstreeks invloed worden uitgeoefend op de specificaties van de sticks. Uiteraard is het mogelijk om in overleg (speciale) sticks te laten maken voor wat betreft mal, samenstelling, kleur en gewicht.

We are sailors, surfers, divers, swimmers. All of the crystal blue persuasion - passionate about our beautiful oceans. Sea Loved is for everyone who loves the ocean and believes that we can all contribute to preserving it. At Sea Loved we work with ocean conservation projects that are run by people who have turned their passion into their way of life. People who dedicate their time, energy and talent to making a difference.

We support these projects by reporting on what they are doing, and more importantly even, why they are doing this. In getting their message out to more people, we aim to inspire our community.

We offer a small range of beautifully crafted, sustainably produced jewellery, inspired by the ocean and the projects we support. These are coming soon and will be available as mindful gifts with a story, created so that we can also support our partners financially.

Royal Auping is the largest independent Dutch bed manufacturer with its own production site in the Netherlands and sales offices in a number of European countries. In addition Auping works closely with international distributors. Auping started as a blacksmith in Deventer in 1888. Johannes Auping started a new trend 125 years ago with the spiral mesh base. After this the company specialised in beds with a spiral mesh base. This was later supplemented with mattresses and box springs. This way Auping transformed itself into the sleeping specialist and market leader in the Netherlands. By continuously investing in innovation and design, Auping has always maintained its status as a trendsetter in sleeping comfort. The focus in this regard is on three brand values: Ultimate Comfort, Design and Durable Quality.

Auping collaborates with scientists and renowned designers on ongoing product innovation. Knowledge of the sleeping process and the use of new materials and techniques form the basis of Auping's unique comfort. The craftsmanship, dedication and experience of employees guarantee durable quality and high service levels. By signing the C2C Charter, Auping became the first bed manufacturer in the world to be entitled to call itself a Cradle to Cradle organisation. Auping is aiming to make all business processes, products and services sustainable and compliant with C2C philosophy by 2020.

We create optimum sustainable environments, as designer, manufacturer and supplier, that have a positive influence on people and planet.

Our designs are practical, well-thought-out, durable  and a little bit (smart). Together with our designers, clients and suppliers, we strive to optimize environments which are stable in value.

Hutspot offers a unique combination of timeless fashion, innovative design, and local art. Aiming to curate an accessible platform, we provide young designers and artists an opportunity to sell their goods alongside established brands.

HOW WE STARTED
Founded in 2012, Hutspot started as a small pop-up store in the Utrechtsestraat. This Amsterdam based concept offered a unique shopping experience, with extensive possibilities for local entrepreneurs and artists to showcase their product.

Our first official store opened in December 2012 at Van Woustraat in Amsterdam. Next to offering product, the store quickly became a popular hangout due to a spacious lunchroom and friendly barber. The concept was expanded with a second store at Rozengracht in Amsterdam one year later. Following, we opened stores in Utrecht (2015), Rotterdam (2016) and Eindhoven (2017). The Hutspot brand, including a webshop, was launched in 2018.

THREE NEW STORES IN 2019
In 2019, we are planning to open three new stores. Our third store in Amsterdam was opened at Magna Plaza in June, following a store in Breda in August. Hutspot store number eight will open its doors at an unknown location later this year.

"Allowing growers to do business successfully"‚Äã

Getting the best out of man and nature

Innovation and creativity are important building blocks for how we manage our business relations. The growers have been our source for many years. They get the best out of nature. Specialist in hard and soft fruits

We also specialise in customised packaging, which you can either choose yourself or together with us. FruitMasters ensures a fruit experience for carefree enjoyment at home or abroad.

Gaastra is the international nautical lifestyle brand with performance and casual collections for men and women. The brand owes its reputation to the balanced mix of 'fashion'‚Äã and 'function'‚Äã. A combination that is clearly and consistently implemented in our clothing lines Gaastra Sportswear, Gaastra Footwear and Gaastra Pro.
 
It all began in 1897 with the ambitious and innovative sailmaker business of Douwe Gaastra in Sneek, The Netherlands. And more than a century later this iconic heritage lives on in our nautical lifestyle brand. Our international allure and many followers range from professional sailors to fashion conscious lovers of the nautical lifestyle.

Protest was founded by a group of snowboarders from Holland. That‚Äôs right: Holland. One of the flattest places in the universe. Home to exactly five hills and fourteen waves. We counted the number of hills and waves and we said, ‚ÄúForget about logic, forget about obstacles - let's do what we love."‚Äã www.protest.eu

Haarlem was once a city with many breweries. Place names such as Brouwersvaart (Brewers'‚Äã Canal) Brouwerskade (Brewers'‚Äã Quay) and Brouwershofje (Brewers'‚Äã Yard) remind us of this rich history. Beer brewing was by 1400 the most important commercial activity of the city. By the late Middle Ages, beer from Haarlem was exported all over the world, indeed even used as a form of currency in the southern province of Oost Zeeland. It was shipped by the Dutch East India Company to the Orient, and was well known in Flanders (Belgium) and Northern France. In 1995, inspired by all this history and the loss of all the historic breweries, a group of enthusiastic Haarlemmers took up the challenge of putting Haarlem back on the world beer map. That year, after centuries of absence, Haarlems Jopenbier was brought back onto the market. This happily coincided with that year's celebrations of the city's 750th anniversary, bringing a taste of the past with Hoppenbier's recipe, which dates from the year 1501.The success of Jopen (Named after an ancient brewing vessel of 112 litres), was followed by the launch of Jopen KOYT, a beer in which the mediaeval recipe demanded the use of herbs for flavouring rather than hops. In 1999, Jopen ADRIAAN was introduced, a light varient of another herbal beer from 1407.
Encouraged by the success of these beers, the Haarlem brewers brought a unique Bokbier (Traditional Dutch Autumn beer) onto the market.This is brewed from four different grains (Malted barley, wheat, oats, rye), smooth tasting rather than sweet. Jopen Bokbier is the best selling beer from an independent brewery in The Netherlands. Since 2003, there is also a Jopen LENTEBIER (Spring beer) available, which is distinguished by the liberal amount of coriander seeds with which it is brewed.

Premium Inc. is een Nederlands, internationaal geori√´nteerd schoenen- en kledingbedrijf. Wij bouwen merken met een eigen identiteit en waar we zelf trots op zijn. Intergas: an introduction. 

Intergas has, for more than 40 years, been at the forefront of domestic boiler manufacture in the Netherlands. The invention of the 'Double High Efficiency'‚Äã heat exchanger has revolutionized boiler technology. 

Double High Efficiency. 

The Intergas Combi Compact HRE boiler has ground breaking technology and incorporates the latest ‚ÄôDouble High Efficiency‚Äô heat exchanger. Due to the separate central heating and hot water circuits the Intergas Combi Compact HRE doesn‚Äôt use a diverter valve and secondary domestic hot water plate heat exchanger. This eliminates a significant source of possible future component failures. Furthermore during hot water usage the pump isn‚Äôt in operation thus enhancing the lifespan of this critical component.

Reliable technology, easy to maintain. 

All parts in the Combi Compact HRE boiler are easily accessible as the boiler case can be easily removed from the front. Furthermore, most parts are interchangeable throughout the entire range thus reducing the need to carry endless amounts of spare parts. The double two-in-one heat exchanger of the Intergas Combi Compact HRE high-efficiency boiler has proven to be extremely reliable. That is why Intergas gives a warranty of 10 years on its heat exchanger. The Combi Compact boiler not only works with the regular ‚Äòon/off‚Äô thermostats but also with programmable room thermostats.

DOC Kaas is een Nederlandse kaasproducent. companyName: Qlip B.V. - Quality Assurance in Dairy
description:
From milk to cheese, and milk powder to milk formula for infants. As a consumer, you naturally expect that these products are safe and of good quality.

Qlip plays an important role herein. We provide independent quality assurance throughout the dairy chain. We provide audits and analyses in the field of food safety, quality, composition and sustainability. And we do this for the entire dairy chain, from farm to retail.

Our auditors conduct over 13,000 audits and reviews of the functioning and fulfillment of specific quality systems annually. We also have the world's largest dairy laboratory with state-of-the-art technology. About 15 million milk samples from cows and goats are analyzed in this laboratory each year. Our qualified employees perform over half a million chemical and microbiological analyses. This results in large amounts of valuable data on a daily basis. With this information, dairy companies and dairy farmers can optimize their processes and business operations.

Our internal quality system is designed to ensure that our operations comply with recognized national and international standards, regulations and guidelines. Various accreditation norms describe how we have to deal with these critical points. The Dutch Accreditation Council, an independent body, determines annually whether our business fulfills the requirements. 

Continuous development of our knowledge and expertise is crucial. We collaborate with customers, research institutes and suppliers to develop new technologies, standards, methods and products. A striking example of successful innovation is the fresh grazed grass indicator. We have made it possible to determine in milk whether cows have been grazing grass outside in the meadow.

We share our specific knowledge and expertise with the international dairy chain through trainings and workshops. In Europe, but also in Asia.

Wij zijn Gulpener, een trotse en duurzame familiebrouwerij uit het Zuidelijkste puntje van Limburg. Al sinds 1825 weten we alles van de fantastische diversiteit aan smaken en aroma‚Äôs waarmee we onze bieren karakter geven. Bieren met een uitgesproken karakter.
Uitgesproken omdat we vrij zijn. Vrij omdat we een onafhankelijke familiebrouwerij zijn. Vrij om onze eigen koers te varen. Vrij om te doen wat goed voelt. Daarom noemen wij onszelf ‚ÄòDe Vrije Brouwer‚Äô.

Wij zijn vrij om te bepalen hoe wij vinden dat bier hoort te smaken, vrij om smaak niet af te vlakken, maar te verrijken. Altijd in een voortdurend experiment op zoek naar nieuwe, rijke smaken. Deze rijke smaken komen voort uit de beste lokale grondstoffen. Zoals de hop uit onze eigen hoptuin, de gerst, tarwe, rogge en spelt van 40 boeren uit onze regio, en water uit onze eigen bronnen. Dit zijn de natuurlijke grondstoffen van onze bieren.

Alleen dan ben je er nog niet. Goed bier ontstaat door deze bijzondere samenwerking, maar zeker ook door het enthousiasme van iedereen die erbij betrokken is; van boer tot brouwer en van brouwer tot barpersoneel. Samen vormen deze eigenschappen de uitgesproken smaken van onze karaktervolle bieren. Die altijd uitgesproken smaak waarmee we de echte bierliefhebber telkens weer willen verrassen.

Alles bij elkaar, maakt van dit bier, Gulpener bier. Het enige echte bier van Nederlandse bodem. Gemaakt voor de bewuste genieter die de pure smaak van ons bier kan waarderen.

Gulpener. De Vrije Brouwer

Een snufje paarse magie 

The Amazing Company. Dat klinkt als een buitengewoon bedrijf. Dat zijn we natuurlijk ook. Maar we staan met beide voeten op de grond. Want dromen is mooi, maar dromen komen alleen uit als je wakker blijft. Toch begon het ooit met een droom: klanten voorzien in alle grote (A-)merken consumentenelektronica en wit- en bruingoed. 

Die droom startte in 1999 met het eerste pakketje vanuit de woning van Theo Engels in Schijndel. Dit werd al gauw ingeruild voor een prachtig bedrijfspand. Nu gevestigd in ‚Äôs-Hertogenbosch met een logistiek centrum in Rosmalen en extern warehouse in Hedel. En met succesvolle dochterondernemingen als Megami, Gezamenlijk Voordeel en Quecom. 

Amacom verzorgt de dagelijkse inkoop, verkoop en distributie voor grote en kleine e-tailers en retailers in de Benelux. Ondersteund door ons eigen online bestel- en informatiesysteem Quecom levert Amacom zes dagen per week, binnen 24 uur, rechtstreeks aan klanten, (web)winkels, pick-up points en magazijnen. 

We geven het direct toe: onze producten zijn overal te koop. Maar zoek je een distributie- en fulfilmentpartner voor wie geen vraag te gek is? Waar mensen werken die je kunt bellen en waar je altijd langs mag komen? Die je blijft verbazen en alles voor je doet? Dan kies je voor Amacom! 

We blijven inzetten op groei. Om die woorden kracht bij te zetten hebben we de handen ineengeslagen met Exertis, een toonaangevende Britse distributeur in onder meer consumentenelektronica, zakelijke communicatiemiddelen, audiovisuele hulpmiddelen en netwerkvoorzieningen. 

Toch zijn we nog altijd hetzelfde warme familiaire bedrijf zoals in de beginjaren. Dat kan alleen met de juiste mensen. We zijn een team van echte aanpakkers. Want onze verantwoordelijkheid stopt niet als een pakket de deur uit is. Die stopt pas als de klant 100% tevreden is. Bij iedere bestelling en ieder pakket geven wij een snufje van onze paarse magie mee. Onzichtbaar en ontastbaar, maar wel wat Amacom amazing maakt.

Veko Lightsystems ontwikkelt, produceert en installeert aluminium lijnverlichting met als uitgangspunt dat alles voor de opdrachtgever zo eenvoudig mogelijk moet zijn: van het ontwikkelen van een lichtplan tot en met de complete oplevering van het verlichtingssysteem. Dat is de kracht van Veko. 

Veko is marktleider in Nederland en sterk groeiend in Duitsland. Het bedrijf, met meer dan honderdvijftig medewerkers, bestaat al meer dan 45 jaar. Hierdoor is Veko in staat om voor elk project een verlichtingsoplossing te bieden.

Innovatie is bij Veko een dagelijkse bezigheid. De producten worden voortdurend beoordeeld door een ervaren en gedreven team van deskundigen waardoor de kwaliteit en het rendement van de armaturen altijd tot de beste in de markt behoren. 

Veko biedt u de volgende voordelen:
- Meer dan 45 jaar ervaring in het ontwikkelen, produceren en installeren van aluminium lijnverlichting.
- Eigen ontwikkelingsafdeling waardoor Veko altijd voorop blijft lopen als het gaat om innovatie.
- Aluminium lijnverlichting met de volgende voordelen: betere installatie en 100% recyclebaar, evenals een optimale warmteregulering waardoor de levensduur van het (LED) armatuur wordt verlengd.
- Voorgemonteerd en geleverd met vrijwel geen verpakking. Dit levert in de meeste gevallen niet alleen een besparing op van 50% installatietijd (en dus snellere afronding van de werkzaamheden), maar levert ook vrijwel geen afval op.
- Veko producten geproduceerd vanaf 1976 zijn eenvoudig om te bouwen naar moderne technologie, zoals LED en/of dynamische verlichting.
- Eigen montageploegen die door hun vakmanschap en ervaring risico's als vertraging in de op

Veko Lightsystems International BV
Clever. Swift. Solid.

Pentair Haffmans develops and manufactures Quality Control and Process Equipment to both recover and manage CO2 for the beverage industry. Mr. Ernest Haffmans founded the company in 1947 as an agent for the European brewing industry, focussing mainly on the supply of raw materials. 

When in the early 1960's Ernest Haffmans decided to develop and assemble Quality Control Equipment, the famous CO2 Gehaltemeter was born. In the 1970's the activities were extended and Haffmans started to deliver CO2-Recovery technology. In 1980 Bert Haffmans succeeded his father and the focus of the company shifted from trading into development, manufacturing and service, focusing on the areas of Quality Control Equipment, Units for Carbonation, Blending, De-aeration and CO2-Recovery. 

In 1998 Norit 'leading in purification'‚Äã became the 100 % shareholder of Haffmans BV and Menno M. Holterman became Managing Director. With customers in more than 150 countries, the Norit Group came to be a real multinational company with strong focus on innovation and customer satisfaction.

A Pentair Company
Recently, Pentair, Inc. acquired Clean Process Technologies (CPT), a division of privately held Norit Holding B.V. As of May 12, 2011, the companies under CPT ‚Äì Filtrix, Haffmans, Nijhuis, Norit Components & Services, Norit Process Technology, S√ºdmo, and X-Flow ‚Äì are part of Pentair‚Äôs Filtration Solutions global business unit.

Keller Kitchens is a renowned Dutch kitchen brand, that has been manufacturing top-quality kitchens for 85 years. Keller kitchens are available at selected kitchen specialist and for the contract market.

Eco-friendly manufacturing is a very important subject on Keller's agenda. That is one of the reasons why Keller was the first Dutch manufacturer with an FSC¬Æ certified kitchen range. Besides the fact that the complete Prolux range is FSC¬Æ certified, Keller uses a wide variety of instruments on voluntary basis to reduce its environmental footprint. For instance, the factory has enough solar panels to generate its own energy demand and waste wood is splintered and used to keep the factory warm during the winter. This makes Keller not only a smart choice... but also a green one.

Het Leger des Heils is wereldwijd actief met inzamelen en verspreiden van tweedehands kleding. Het langs de deuren gaan met de voddenkar was √©√©n van onze eerste activiteiten. Inmiddels 125 jaar later hebben we een complete logistiek en een effici√´nte bedrijfsvoering in huis, ondergebracht bij de divisie ReShare. Zo kunnen ook mensen met een minimuminkomen kleding kopen. Tot slot verkopen we een deel van de kleding aan sorteerbedrijven. Everybody deserves to enjoy food. 
We build on the potential of potatoes and people to develop new potato varieties that add value for all parties in the value chain. Our varieties perform better in changing circumstances and contribute to better availability and more enjoyment for everybody.

Our story starts with Kees Meijer Sr when he became a potato trader, more than 100 years ago, in 1920. He wanted to give his family and himself a better life. Building on potential
Kees Sr started as a trader. When his son Henk joined the business, he added an international, customer-oriented approach with which he further developed the company. Later, his grandson Kees Jr also joined the family company. He became the driving force behind the expansion of the company into a potato chain. Today, the fourth generation of the Meijer family has joined the company. Meijer management and former and current staff contributed to the company‚Äôs entrepreneurial spirit by expressing their own talent and vision in their work. In this way, we both utilize and nourish people‚Äôs potential.

Our people built a solid base for Meijer Potato. The history nourishes our faith in the potato, in its potential as food and as a source of economic value and welfare. We have a great deal of trust in our people who fulfill that potential. Potatoes are an important source of personal and economic growth and our means to contribute to more enjoyment and wellbeing.

In 1946, richtte Joe Hunter en Henry Sonnenberg een nieuw bedrijf op, genaamd the Hunter Douglas Machinery Corporation. Keesing Media Group Purpose
Our purpose is to change the world ‚Äî one puzzle player at a time. And while our customers may not know our name, they really love our products. Puzzling slows the aging process and is fun for players of all ages. Thanks to the millions of puzzles and braintainment games we produce annually; we‚Äôre making the world a smarter and better place.  

Keesing Media Group Culture
We know the importance of having fun. That‚Äôs why we create a fun and positive work environment. It‚Äôs our number one priority. Because a positive company is a successful company.
Our culture is informal and professional, and we always support each other. We‚Äôre never afraid to roll up our sleeves and lend a team member a hand.
Since our early days more than 100 years ago, many things have changed, including our products and how people use them. We continue to embrace change through growth and digital products while honouring our rich history. And some things never change ‚Äî like our down-to-earth nature and passion to always deliver our best work. 

Why our company values matter to all of us
You can think of Keesing values as our company‚Äôs DNA. Our three values are: brainy, modesty and quality. They are the essence of Keesing Media Group‚Äôs identity. And they are something we all share personally as well as professionally that shapes our culture.  
On a business level, our values are unique to Keesing and help us stand apart in the market and against our competition. They are part of everything we do and at the heart of every decision we make.  
And no matter what your role or where you are located, our shared values strengthen our brand and improve teamwork.

Care Cosmetics. Gestart op een zolderkamer. Nu, bijna 25 jaar later, zijn we de grootste cosmeticadistributeur voor beautyprofessionals in de Benelux.

We zijn beauty- en businesspartner en vinden het niet erg om net iets harder te lopen dan een ander. Misschien komt het door onze energie, het schijnt nogal aanstekelijk te zijn. Of misschien zijn we gewoon vakidioten. 
Wil je, net als 4000 andere beautyprofessionals ervaren hoe het is om samen met ons succesvol te zijn? Dan nodigen we je graag uit in ons pand. Een warme groet zit er nu helaas even niet in (RIVM, you know) maar je merkt snel genoeg hoe we jouw komst waarderen.
Rest ons nog te zeggen dat we natuurlijk niet meer op een zolderkamer zitten. In ons moderne pand bewegen we ons van kantoortuin naar magazijn, van studio naar salon, sportschool of Experience Room. Even bijkomen doen we in de Care Club. 
Stilzitten is niet zo ons ding. Het beste uit onszelf halen wel. Vind je het gek dat onze slogan No limits is?
Neem vooral een kijkje op onze site. Dompel je onder in onze wereld en de webshop. Ook als je geen klant bent, log je hier eenvoudig in en vraag je snel een informatiepakket aan. Easy!

Fairtrasa is a global social enterprise that empowers small-scale farmers to lift themselves out of poverty. Our unique development model gives farmers the training, resources, and direct market access they need to become organic producers and independent agro-entrepreneurs. Through our integrated supply chain, farmers provide high-quality produce to our customers worldwide, receiving fair income for their work. Fairtrasa sells a wide variety of fruit products and is one of the largest providers of Organic and Fairtrade fruit from Latin America.

Fairtrasa was founded in 2005 in Mexico by Patrick Struebi, a former executive at an international commodities trading firm in Switzerland. Patrick left his corporate career after a personal epiphany to devote himself to social entrepreneurship, and soon shipped the world‚Äôs first container of Fairtrade Organic avocados. Since then, Fairtrasa has grown into a global group of 15 companies in 12 countries, impacting more than 40,000 lives. 

Fairtrasa is founded on our unique and pioneering Three Tier Farmer Development Model, which gives small-scale farmers hands-on support tailored to their specific needs. Our dedicated local teams help farmers learn organic farming skills, organize themselves effectively, build and operate their own infrastructure, and achieve independence as producers and exporters. The goal is for farmers to improve their businesses, communities, and lives‚Äîpermanently and sustainably.

In recognition of our impact, Fairtrasa and founder Patrick Struebi have earned awards and fellowships from Ashoka, Endeavor, the Schwab Foundation, the World Economic Forum, the abc* Foundation, Yale University, Fordham University, and the Clinton Global Initiative, among others.

Fairtrasa is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland, with supply and farmer development companies in Mexico, Peru, the Dominican Republic, Chile and Colombia, and import and sales companies in Holland, Germany, Spain, the UK, and the US.

Remkes / GPS has more than 75 years of experience and specializes in the slaughter, yarn and further processing of poultry meat. We strive for optimum quality every day, throughout the entire process from slaughtering to packaging. Modern production systems and strictly separated logistics flows ensure that Remkes meets the latest standards in production and food safety. Remkes Epe employs around 120 employees who take care of the slaughter and further processing of soup chickens on a daily basis. More than 350 employees work at GPS in Nunspeet. Broilers are slaughtered and further processed at this location. Remkes Convenience in Barneveld will start this fall with a new production company, where we marinate and roast chicken products. All branches will be expanded further this year. We are therefore in full development! Quality, environment & animal welfare Remkes uses fair and transparent trade, responsible handling of animal welfare, the environment and human and animal health as logical policy principles. In the vision of Remkes, collaboration with permanent relations is the way to reduce costs in the production chain and generate maximum value for supplier, buyer and final consumer. Together with Novi-Pluim, the NoviPlus sustainability program has been developed with input from the Animal Sciences Group of Wageningen University and social organizations such as Solidaridad and Nature and Environment. NoviPlus sets requirements for the propagation company and the slaughterhouse in the areas of animal health, human health (antibiotics), animal welfare and the environment. All companies participating in the program are checked and certified annually by a recognized institution (CBD / Verin).

companyName: Schoenfabriek Wed. J.P. van Bommel bv
description:
In 1734, the Van Bommel family started producing hand-made quality shoes in Breda, the Netherlands. At present, the brothers Reynier, Floris and Pepijn van Bommel represent the 9th generation to manage the family business. The knowledge transferred from father to son continues to be employed to this day in the manufacture of Van Bommel shoes.

During the production process, on average, a Van Bommel shoe undergoes some 280 treatments. High-quality materials such as leather inner sole, calf‚Äôs leather lining, full-grain calf‚Äôs upper leather, waxed thread and vat-tanned sole leather all guarantee quality. The collection includes shoes manufactured according to the moccasin method, the goodyear method, the blake method, the sachetto method and the ago method.

In 1952, Van Bommel was granted the title ‚ÄòBy Royal Appointment‚Äô, by Royal Decree.

Over Sparta

Neem bijvoorbeeld de ontwikkeling van de mamafiets of de introductie van echte ‚Äòlifestyle-modellen‚Äô als de moderne versie van de oer-Hollandse transportfiets, het begon allemaal bij Sparta. Bakkerij Holland, ooit begonnen als kleine ambachtelijke dorpsbakker, is inmiddels uitgegroeid tot een geautomatiseerde moderne bakkerij die streeft naar de hoogste kwaliteit voor de nationale en internationale markt.

In 1937 startte Hendrikus Holland samen met zijn vrouw een kleine ambachtelijke bakkerij aan het Oosteinde, de dorpsstraat van Vriezenveen. In die tijd was hij √©√©n van de vele bakkers die ons dorp kende. Getypeerd door de traditionele bakfiets en een winkeltje aan de straat, zoals ook veel andere bakkers dat hadden, was het begin van Bakkerij Holland een feit.

Al snel kwam de ondernemersgeest van Hendrikus boven en zag hij in dat als hij zou willen overleven tussen al die andere bakkers, hij zich zou moeten onderscheiden. Zo kwam hij op het idee om lijnmatig te gaan bakken, wat voor die tijd echt bijzonder was. Door deze automatisering kon Bakkerij Holland op grote schaal bakken en samenwerkingen aan gaan met grote afnemers en supermarktketens. Niet alleen in Nederland, maar ook in Duitsland, Belgi√´, Luxemburg en Frankrijk kwamen er mooie samenwerkingen waardoor verdere uitbreiding van wens naar noodzaak ging. In 1999 heeft Bakkerij Holland haar tweede filiaal geopend in Roosendaal en tot op heden bezig met verder automatiseren, innoveren en het verduurzamen van onze twee bakkerijen.

Bakkerij Holland is een professioneel familiebedrijf waarin een hoge mate van betrokkenheid de boventoon voert. Door onze interne korte lijnen kunnen wij snel schakelen en hebben wij echt oog voor onze medewerkers: bij ons vind je nog oprechte collegialiteit op de werkvloer!

Samen met al onze collega‚Äôs zijn wij continue op zoek naar nieuwe uitdagingen en mogelijkheden om te groeien. Wij geven onze medewerkers volop de ruimte om zich binnen de organisatie te ontwikkelen. Wij denken niet in titels maar in uitdagingen!

We want to welcome you in our chocolate wonderland! Where we want to surprise you with our endless variations of unique chocolates and flavours. It‚Äôs been over 10 years since we‚Äôve started our chocolate factory in Kerkrade where our Willy Wonka - Chocolate Company‚Äôs head Chef - Toussaint started with our first creation and big pride: The Hotchocspoon! A lovely chunk of chocolate on a wooden spoon to stir through steaming hot milk. Delicious! Until this day we still make everything ourselfs. Artisinal craftmanship, real handmade chocolate from the highest quality. 

High quality chocolate with a surprising twist to make life just that little bit more exciting; that is the chocolate from Chocolate Company. Working with Cacao-Trace chocolate was therefore a logical step for Chocolate Company to take. This unique sustainability program focuses on the realization of high quality cocoa beans with a better market price for the cocoa farmers involved. The fermentation process is the most important "ingredient" for quality chocolate, and therefore the focus point of Cacao-Trace. By the help of fermentation experts, cocoa farmers receive local support and coaching. Cacao-Trace also offers the cocoa farmers a premium for supplying high-quality cocoa beans, which they can invest more in their plantation, their skills and in their families. This fits perfectly with the Chocolate Company mission to make life a little tastier, more fun and more enjoyable for everyone! In addition, Cacao-Trace makes a chocolate bonus available every year, consisting of an amount of ‚Ç¨ 0.10 per kilo of chocolate sold that farmers can spend on their community. With this unique chocolate bonus, Cacao-Trace tries to achieve a better distribution in the value chain. This allows Chocolate Company together with Cacao-Trace to make the most delicious chocolate and contribute to a better future for cocoa farmers!
We want to make every day a little bit brighter, more beautiful, tasteful, creamier or rathe

De Monnik Dranken is a nationally operating Dutch beverage wholesaler. With the 4th generation at the helm now, our family business has grown into an organization with more than 100 employees and a  product range that covers approximately 9,500 different types of beverage and beverage-related items.

What does De Monnik Dranken do?
Our activities can be divided into three different categories;

Beverage wholesaler
Our extensive customer base includes wholesalers, supermarkets, retail organizations, liquor stores, wine merchants, specialty shops and caterers from all over The Netherlands.

Brand Builder
Consumers are increasingly valuing experience, with quality being seen as the most important factor. Distinctive character and quality play an increasingly important role in the beverage industry. It is important to hospitality companies, liquor stores or specialist stores to work with products that offer this.


Importer
De Monnik Dranken imports a wide range of wines and well-known beverage brands from different countries and continents. We are always looking for brands that add something to our range and also fit well into the philosophy of our family business.

How do we do that?
The combination of the 3 activities mentioned above, in combination with our family business culture make us unique in the world of drinks.  It certainly enables us to truly grasp and understand our customer and supplier wishes and demands.

Royal
2018 was a special year for De Monnik Dranken. In the first place because we celebrated our 100th anniversary in October 2018. In addition, His Majesty the King has bestowed the Honorary Title ‚ÄúRoyal‚Äù to De Monnik Dranken in December 2018.

Two important milestones that we are extremely proud of!

Onze mensen

companyName: NEODERMA Luxury Skincare | Vegan Beauty | Clean Beauty | Airless Beauty | Cruelty-Free Skincare
description:
NEODERMA: Innovative. Ethical. Beautiful.¬†
Clean Beauty for the Smart Generation

NEODERMA presents the art of innovation, and the science of flawless skin. By reimagining luxury skincare, we revolutionise the essence of daily skincare essentials.¬†

Cruelty-free formulae meets cutting-edge airless technology. Potent FUSION-BIOTICS¬© ingredients meet an array of precious natural extracts. The result? A broad range of future-forward, ethical, and beautiful skincare products, curated and crafted for the needs of the smart generation.

The Airless Revolution in Smart Skincare

NEODERMA is the world‚Äôs first 100% airless luxury skincare brand, pioneering an approach which ensures precision and perfection with every use. Our audacious products are sealed and finessed within an airless container, preserving each formula in its purest state.¬†

This signature method doesn‚Äôt just guarantee lasting freshness and the integrity of NEODERMA products. It eliminates the use of potentially harmful preservatives, allowing the potency of the natural ingredients, electrolytes, and probiotics to truly shine.¬†

Clean Beauty: Radiant Skin in Harmony with Nature

Skincare science has advanced to the point at which there are, quite simply, no more excuses for anything other than the utmost in clean beauty standards. Our skin is complex, fascinating, and capable of expressing the utmost in natural beauty and radiance. As such, it deserves skincare solutions that not only work with your innate natural balance, but which also harmonise with the world which we all share.¬†

NEODERMA is committed to cruelty-free beauty practices, and to upholding the highest standards of clean beauty. Our innovative and certified-vegan formulae are not - and will never be - tested on animals, and our sustainability goals go above and beyond the international standard. Natural beauty isn‚Äôt just a goal, it‚Äôs a philosophy informing every aspect of what we do best.¬†
¬†

Gamko manufactures and supplies professional coolers for the bar and leisure industry
Gamko is a leading manufacturer and supplier of professional coolers for the bar and leisure
industry. Since its establishment in 1958, Gamko has grown into an international company, which
focuses mainly on manufacturing, selling and maintaining a complete range of professional
drinks coolers.

Quality from Europe
With its own production and a research department in Etten-Leur, The Netherlands, Gamko
develops, manufactures and supplies products that are tailored to the needs and quality
requirements of today‚Äôs catering industry. Aspects such as design, functionality, customer
satisfaction and the environment play a major role in this. Gamko is ISO9001- and ISO14001-
certified, guaranteeing the quality of our products and processes and ensuring continuous
improvement. 
Modern production of equipment guarantees an excellent price-quality ratio and because
production takes place in the Netherlands, Gamko also has highly flexible delivery times. If you
choose Gamko, then you will be choosing quality, flexibility and sustainability.

Gamko: an international player with world-class products
Gamko has its own export department with a worldwide network of agents and its own sales
organisations in the Benelux, the United Kingdom and France. Our sales organisation delivers
a complete range of cooling equipment, in particular for the bar and leisure industry right
throughout the world.

In 1964, based in the small Dutch town of Harmelen, Flash started manufacturing wiping cloths for end users in the Netherlands and Belgium. The company relocated to Nuland in the mid 1970s and was taken over by Ruud van den Berge in 1986.

In 2002, the commercial activities developed by Flash over the course of time were hived off. Since then, Flash further specialised in the production of nonwoven wiping cloths and cleaning cloths, its main customers being wholesalers across Europe.

In 2006, Flash acquired Factron, located in Groot-Ammers, expanding its range with pads for scrubbing machines and abrasive sponges. In January 2012, the two companies came together in one large production facility in Oss, fully integrating Factron into Flash BV, both physically and administratively.

Flash‚Äôs mission is to grow further, driven by innovation. In the context of our mission, we set up a new production line for the manufacture of disposable ‚ÄúFFastmops‚Äù. With this production line, we cater to the needs of the market as regards hygiene, the environment and ease of use.

Nowadays, Flash is the manufacturer of cleaning equipment, impregnated floorcloth, microfibreproducts and diposable mops. The private labels are: Spray2Go, Wet2Go, Dust-A-Go, Roll-O-Wipe and FFastMop.

Email: info@flash.nl
Tel: +31 412 756930

Als een van de grootste fietsenwinkels van Nederland met een enorme werkplaats en snelgroeiende webshop zijn we constant op zoek naar toptalent.

Als je onze nieuwe collega wordt, staat je flink wat te wachten. Ons hele bedrijf staat in het teken van het overtreffen van verwachtingen. We leggen de lat hoog en zoeken telkens nieuwe uitdagingen. Nog belangrijker: we gaan die uitdagingen met z'n allen aan.
