Vision
Our natural vinegar and syrups make the world healthier, cleaner or more tasteful.

Mission
We make this happen by playing a leading role worldwide in a sustainable and fair way with natural vinegar and, in markets selected by us, with syrups. 

Values
Words that apply to us are Progressive, Sustainable, Pleasurable and Flexible.

Natural vinegar								
At Burg Group, we believe in the strength of natural vinegar, also with respect to food and health. We manufacture our natural vinegar to an exceptionally high degree of acidity of 24%. This renders natural vinegar particularly suitable for low-cost bulk transport in Europe and elsewhere. We supply natural vinegar as a semi-manufacture for the food industry, but also as an end product in consumer packing. The same applies to our wine vinegar, cider vinegar and herbal vinegar as well as our organic and balsamic vinegar.

Cleaning vinegar
We believe in the strength of natural vinegar, also as an alternative to cleaning products. Cleaning vinegar is an environment-friendly and budget-friendly cleaning product that is highly effective. As a cleaning product it can be used for many applications in and around the house. The classic cleaning vinegar belongs to the wide assortment of cleaning products we offer, such as cleaning vinegar gels and sprayers, or special cleaners for the bathroom, kitchen, windows and mirrors.

Syrups
We are proud of our delicious syrups with a great many surprising flavours for children and adults to enjoy every day. Burg Group stands out by making syrups organic and natural, with less calories and with the finest flavour. What is in the syrups is stated in all honesty. 
We supply fruit cordials in all flavours and compositions imaginable. In addition, we have sugar-free syrups, concentrated juices, ice tea, vegetable syrups and fruit mixes in our assortment.

Norit Process Technology helps breweries to meet demands regarding economical and environmental parameters.

The Norit group consist of valve-technology (Norit S√ºdmo), water utilities (Norit Membrane Technology) and CO2 systems (Norit Haffmans) and is supplemented by Norit Process Technology‚Äôs cold-block systems and diatomaceous earth free Beer Membrane Filtration, yeast management and diverse beer processing units such as flash pasteurizing, wort aeration & CIP.

Norit Process Technology acts as an integration manager within the Norit group and in this  capacity it deals with projects from wort cooler to filler, up to renovation, total upgrading, extension and overall engineering and worldwide project management of Greenfield projects.

Het is 1891. De wereld van familiebedrijf Ruig omvat niet meer dan een oude bakfiets, een boerderij en het Amstelhotel als klant voor verse eieren. De schepper van Ruig, Pieter Ruig, had koopmansbloed want hij breidde zijn assortiment al snel uit met de handel in kippen. In die tijd was kip een typisch luxe- en horecaproduct. Pas in de tweede helft van de jaren vijftig nam door de toenemende welvaart de markt voor gevogelte enorm toe. Horecaondernemers werden door de mogelijkheden van het opdelen van kip op maat door Ruig bediend en particulieren konden hun poeliersproducten in de nieuwe winkel in Amsterdam kopen.

Het leveren van eerlijke, ambachtelijke producten van topkwaliteit wordt de inspiratie voor poelier Ruig. Mede door productvernieuwing en het voortdurend aanpassen van productiewijze aan de sterk veranderde maatschappij groeide het bedrijf flink. Inmiddels zijn we vele jaren verder en heeft Ruig zich ontwikkeld als leverancier en producent van kwalitatief wild en gevogelte voor de professionele keuken. Sinds 1994 is Ruig als Verspartner van Sligro gevestigd in 36 zelfbedieningsvestigingen. Daarnaast worden de wild en gevogelte producten van Ruig geleverd via de Bezorgservice-groothandels van Sligro. Sinds 1997 levert Ruig ook een kwalitatief hoogwaardig bake-off assortiment onder de naam Loustain. In 2017 ontving Ruig het predicaat Koninklijk als kroon op al het werk!

Co√∂peratie Vitelia is een agrarische co√∂peratie die opereert in de dierlijke als ook de plantaardige sector. Zij produceert hoogwaardige voeders voor de veehouderij. Daarnaast heeft de co√∂peratie een handelsonderneming die voornamelijk levert aan de boomkwekerij sector resp. boomteelt, vollegrondssierteelt en containerveld teelt.

Co√∂peratie Vitelia's main tasks are of an agricultural nature. It produces feed (Vitelia Voeders) and has a trading company in horticultural goods (Vitelia Agrocultuur)

Royal Fassin werkt al meer dan 100 jaar dagelijks met hart en ziel aan verantwoord en heerlijk snoepgoed. En dat is niet zomaar snoepgoed! Wist je dat wij de zure matten en aardbei- en dropveters hebben uitgevonden? Zeker als kind moet je deze weleens gegeten hebben! 

Ons werk doen we met veel passie. We blijven nieuw snoepgoed ontwikkelen en gebruiken de nieuwste technieken. Zo zijn wij wereldwijde specialist en marktleider in de productie van ge√´xtrudeerd snoepgoed, waar de zure matten een voorbeeld van zijn. En ook onze persoonlijke ontwikkeling staat niet stil: er zijn veel opleidingsmogelijkheden om onze kennis up-to-date te houden. 

Deze passie zorgt ervoor dat we de afgelopen jaren flink zijn gegroeid. 10 jaar geleden werd ons harde werken zelfs beloond met een koninklijke onderscheiding! Toch zijn we nog altijd een hecht en gezellig familiebedrijf.  De sfeer is ongedwongen en zijn de lijntjes kort. En in ons team is regelmatig plek voor iemand die net als wij met hart en ziel aan verantwoord en heerlijk snoepgoed wil werken. 

Benieuwd naar de mogelijkheden voor jou bij Royal Fassin? Neem dan een kijkje op www.werkenbijroyalfassin.nl.

Van der Zee bestaat sinds 1925 en is in de loop der jaren uitgegroeid tot een gerenommeerd leverancier van vlees en vleeswaren aan de institutionele markt en de betere horeca.
 
Van der Zee verwerkt iedere dag het beste vlees voor haar klanten in de horeca via haar slagerijen gevestigd in de Hanos te Amsterdam, Antwerpen, Apeldoorn, Breda, Doetinchem, Eindhoven, Groningen, Hasselt, Heerenveen, Heerlen, Nijmegen, Utrecht, Valkenburg, Venlo en Zwolle. Behalve aan de horeca vinden de producten van Van der Zee via de hoofdvestiging iedere dag haar weg naar grootverbruikers als ziekenhuizen, instellingen etc.
 
Het hoofdkantoor en √©√©n van de productiebedrijven zijn gevestigd in Emmen. Daarnaast is er in Twello een productiebedrijf en een horecadistributiecentrum gevestigd. In de Van der Zee bedrijven werken iedere dag tientallen mensen met plezier aan de meest uiteenlopende vleesproducten.

Founded in 1885, in 2015 Geesa has been active in the field of bathroom accessories for 130 years and is a market leader in the Netherlands in the professional segment (fitters and bathroom specialist shops) and authoritative in the export to 65 other countries. We have achieved this position by consistently targeting quality. 
We love design, the combination of a magnificent design and its functional application. It is our job to pay 100% attention to bathroom and lavatory details. It is our core activity, as well as our passion.

Founded in 1754 by Gerrit van Loon, Sealskin remains a family-owned company specialised in designing and producing high-quality and easy-to-install showers, baths and various other bathroom products. Futhermore we are not only a part of the internationally operating Coram Group, we are a team of passionate and dedicated people who like to excel at our work. 
With over 250 years of expertise, service, design, passion for details we take pride in being a trusted partner to our retailers, installers, business partners and consumers.
May we inspire you?

TotaalVERS is een regionale leverancier van vers-, convenience en diepvries-producten met daarnaast een compleet servicepakket aan droge kruidenierswaren en non-food. Inspelend op de voortdurend veranderende eisen van de markt hebben wij ons ontwikkeld tot een specialist van formaat en beleveren wij dagelijks onze klanten, die actief zijn in de zorg- en welzijnssector, de horeca en de industrie.

TotaalVERS kan u een breed assortiment aan producten leveren. Van vers tot panklaar tot convenience. En van eenvoudige tot luxe artikelen in het totale spectrum van aardappelen, groenten, fruit, vlees, vis, wild en gevogelte, brood en banket, diepvries, droge kruidenierswaren en non-food. Wij zijn een jonge full service organisatie, die net zo veel aandacht besteed aan de bereiding van onze producten als aan de logistiek en de administratieve afhandeling. 

Samen met u zoeken wij naar oplossingen die passen bij uw vraag of uitdaging. Bij ons krijgt u altijd maatwerk. Naast kwaliteit staan service en flexibiliteit hoog in ons vaandel. 

Onze visie is dat eten een belangrijke bijdrage levert aan het welbevinden van uw gasten en klanten, vooral als zij door bijzondere omstandigheden extra aandacht nodig hebben. Zo zorgt TotaalVERS niet alleen voor een voortreffelijke uitvoering van uw wensen, maar dragen wij ook bij aan de klanttevredenheid van uw gehele organisatie.

Vobra Special Petfoods is al ruim 85 jaar een familiebedrijf dat zich gespecialiseerd heeft in het maken van honden- en kattenvoeding. Naast de eigen merken CaroCroc, CASA-FERA, Impress Your Dog en SANIMED biedt Vobra ook eindeloze mogelijkheden om samen met onze specialisten een eigen merk honden- of kattenvoeding te ontwikkelen. A signature with taste

Een dynamisch familiebedrijf waar klantgericht werken, flexibiliteit en duurzaamheid centraal staan. Brinkers Food was founded by Bernardus in 1889 and was originally a small trading company, specialised in the distribution of margarine, in those days a new product used as a replacement for the much more expensive butter. 

Shortly after the second world war, one of Brinkers‚Äô sons started a new venture introducing a brand new product: a chilled chocolate butter, Choba. This product was basically the first chocolate spread ever on the market and even today, Choba is still a very well-known product on the Dutch market. Later on, already in the early sixties, Choba was followed by Nusco, the now classic hazelnut chocolate spread. 

For the past 25 years, the company is managed by the fourth generation Brinkers: a highly experienced management team, together with a very committed and loyal work-force, ready to face all the new challenges the food industry will experience in the years to follow. Brinkers'‚Äã goal is very clear: to further build a successful family-business, based on flexibility, quality, sustainability and a no-nonsense management style.

Brinkers has over the years successfully developed brands in every segment of the international marketplace:

Organic: La Vida Vegan, La Vida Vegan PROTEIN, So Vegan So Fine, So Vegan So Fine PROTEIN, Chocolate Rhapsody, It‚Äôs My Life, Nuscobio, Nuscarobe

Conventional: Chocolate Symphony, Nusco, Nusco PROTEIN, Nusco Palm oil-free & Vegan, Nusica, Nusica PROTEIN, BubbleChoq, Twist

Apart from being a successful producer of leading brands, Brinkers is considered to be one of Europe‚Äôs leading suppliers of a wide range of first class chocolate spreads under private label. From its central location in the heart of Europe, Brinkers distributes its quality products world-wide.
Actiforce designs, produces and distributes working solution products which are height-adjustable. Our design process begins with the need of the consumer.

We care about your safety so you can enjoy your future rides in any conditions.

Find our stores throughout Europe with latest innovations and collections of world leading brands in motorsport.

Paintbrushes carefully touch the white earthenware, whilst elsewhere clay is poured into handmade moulds. It is here, at Royal Delft, that craftsmen have been creating iconic Delft Blue for almost 400 years. 
Royal Delft, established in 1653, is the last remaining Delftware factory from the 17th century that still produces hand painted Delft Blue according to centuries-old tradition. Discover all about the history, craftsmanship and innovation of this royal company during your visit.

Royal Delft is also the perfect company for bespoke gifts. What better way to say thank you or congratulate someone than with a handmade present made by master craftsmen that have been influenced by 365 years of tradition.

Our mission is to keep being a valued, reliable partner and to act as a global company with the speed, commitment, humanity and flexibility of a small/local company. All our products are subject to rigorous quality control. Amefa is also committed to improving working conditions in our global supply chain, we therefore are member of the BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative).

Het platform Verstrade.nl wil het rechtstreeks leveren van duurzame/ambachtelijke en/of biologische versproducten landelijk mogelijk maken. Levering geschiedt rechtstreeks van de producent/ kweker/teler naar de zakelijke afnemer.

Verstrade.nl streeft door met √©√©n online oplossing aan te bieden naar een eerlijke prijs en transparantie van duurzame ambachtelijk en biologische versproducten voor zowel de producent/kweker/teler als voor de afnemer. Met daarnaast volledige logistieke diensten en back‚Äìoffice faciliteiten de specifieke processen effici√´nter en gemakkelijker te maken.

Door de effici√´nte bundeling van vers stromen door slimme ICT in samenwerking met het professionele logistieke distributienetwerk van Vers & Fijn Benelux  wordt het milieu door het vervoer van de streekproducten zo min mogelijk belast en ontvang de horeca minder leveranciers aan de deur. Hierdoor levert Verstrade.nl  tevens  een bijdrage aan de verbetering van het milieu.

Voor Verstrade.nl stopt maatschappelijk verantwoord ondernemen niet bij de deuren van haar eigen bedrijf. Integendeel. Ondernemen met oog voor de economische prestaties van de aangesloten producenten, gericht op duurzaamheid, minder verspilling en bescherming van het milieu alsmede met respect voor de sociale situatie van de medemens. Dit gaat gepaard in een samenwerking met Voedselbanken en met bedrijven die opereren met mensen met een afstand tot de arbeidsmarkt.

vanRijsingengreen werkt samen met de natuur aan gezonde groenteproducten. Onze bedrijven zaaien, oogsten, verwerken en verkopen een grote vari√´teit aan groenteproducten op een duurzame manier. Ge√Ønspireerd door de natuur, accepteren we geen verspilling. We gebruiken alle delen van onze groenten. We bewaken, hergebruiken en versterken onze natuurlijke bronnen door intensieve teeltbegeleiding.

We zijn gek op groente. Daarom zoeken we voortdurend innovatieve manieren om alles van de groente te gebruiken. Organisch materiaal dat niet voor consumptie geschikt is, gaat naar een biovergister om daar te dienen voor de opwekking van elektriciteit. Niets gaat verloren.

vanRijsingengreen bestaat uit vier divisies die zich met vollegrondsgroente bezighouden: vanRijsingensource, vanRijsingeningredients, vanRijsingenfreshservice en vanRijsingencarrotconcepts. De divisies delen behalve groenten en kennis van groenten, ook een hoger doel met elkaar: zero waste. We willen niets verspillen en alles tot op de laatste druppel of vezel tot waarde brengen.

Run2Day maakt hardlopen nog leuker!
Run2Day vindt het belangrijk dat je plezier hebt en behoudt in het hardlopen.
Functionele kleding, de juiste schoen en een goed advies dragen bij aan dit plezier. Ja, daar hebben we allemaal weleens mee te maken. Daarom nemen wij alleen genoegen met de beste producten zodat we het beste uit het hardlopen kunnen halen!

In de Run2Day winkels kun je onder meer terecht voor een loopanalyse. Middels deze loopanalyse krijg je een schoenadvies op maat, zodat je weet welke hardloopschoen past bij jouw loopstijl. We hebben een ruime collectie hardloopschoenen van verschillende merken.

The Bos Group is an international organization, which develops and distributes high-end sports and lifestyle brands like Maruti, Australian Footwear, Australian Sportswear, Geox, Converse Bags and Babolat. We market several brands globally.

companyName: Yarrah Organic Petfood - a Certified B corp.
description:
Yarrah has been producing organic petfood since 1992, we were actually the first company in Europe to produce organic petfood.

Loets ten Cate founded ten Cate in 1952 with a mission to bring quality to the people. In the town of Geesteren, Twente ‚Äî the centre of the Dutch textile industry ‚Äî Loets and the many locals working with him built a remark able company. Driven by hard work, technical innovation and good old reliability. With a broad assortment of under wear for the entire family, ten Cate soon became a Dutch staple and one of  the most loved brands in the Netherlands. 

Now, 65 years after Loets opened the doors of his firm, we continue to proudly bring quality to the people. And even though we‚Äôre no longer officially a family company, we consider ourselves to be a true family business. With products that last and an eye for the people we work with. HON is a leading value-added distributor in the Netherlands for consumer electronics products. It is part of Tech Data Inc., one of the worlds largest distributors at information technology. The companys head office is located in Deventer the Netherlands with 4 warehouse sites at Deventer, Etten Leur, Drachten and Venlo respectively. HON delivers products from over 100 vendors to retailers, serving a market of more than 1.900 sales outlets of which 1.500 outlets daily. Lenger Seafoods is a dynamic worldwide enterprise whose activities cover the fishing, cultivation, purchasing, processing, storage and distribution of a wide and attractive assortment of shellfish and crustaceans.

The Lenger family from Harlingen have been active in the shellfish industry for over 93 years when they fished for herring and anchovy. Later they started to farm mussels and they began to fish on cockles on the Waddensea. 

Today Lenger Seafoods stands for fishing, cultivation, processing and marketing of traditional and sustainable fished shellfish - and crustaceans like cockles, mussels, razor clams, scallops, whelks, oysters, langoustines and much more. Export of frozen, chilled, fresh and preserved products goes worldwide into retail, foodservice - and industrial markets.

For its headquarters the Group chose Yerseke, the shellfish centre of northern Europe with fast distribution to the main markets in Europe. In Harlingen Lenger has developed a strong shellfish production with close distance to the source. These two locations ensure that Lenger is active in what for centuries have been the two most important shellfish grounds in the Netherlands, the Easterscheldt and the Waddensea.

Lenger Seafoods recognises the need for clarity, both internal as well as external. The transparent company structure guarantees clarity in communication with clients at all levels. You are always connected by a direct line to their personnel, many of whom have a fisheries background and all have extensive knowledge of the products that we bring on the market.

Some facts about the Lenger Seafoods Group:

- Founded in Harlingen 1925
- Family Lenger, 93 years in shellfish business
- 300 employees
- Brands; LENGERs and Du Nord, La Bigorne
- BRC - and IFS higher level
- MSC products

Wij zijn Schenkeveld. Wat we doen, doen we goed. Met passie voor perfectie. Schenkeveld gaat elke dag de uitdaging aan om de tomatenteelt te vernieuwen, optimaliseren & perfectioneren. 

Ga jij ook deze uitdaging aan?

* Eerlijke, authentieke gezonde gemaksvoeding

Innovatief
Onze productontwikkelaars zijn dagelijks bezig met het uitwerken van nieuwe idee√´n, zowel in individuele producten als in gehele concepten. No Excess is a Dutch company, established in beautiful Amsterdam, with both a national and international focus. Nevertheless, the company‚Äôs approach will always remain ‚ÄúDutch‚Äù: down-to-earth and uncomplicated.

Fashion for Good is the global initiative that‚Äôs here to make all fashion good.

By sparking and scaling innovation, by offering practical action in the form of support, funding and roadmaps, and by fostering sector-wide collaboration rather than competition, we enable the daring invention and widespread adoption of good fashion practice.

Iris van Herpen stands for a reciprocity between craftsmanship and innovation in technique and materials. She creates a modern view on Haute  Couture that combines fine handwork techniques with digital technology .Van Herpen forces fashion to the extreme contradiction between beauty and regeneration. It is her unique way to reevaluate reality and so to express and underline individuality.

The essence of van Herpen is expressing the character  and emotions of a woman and to extend the shape of the feminine body in detail. She mixes craftsmanship- using old and forgotten techniques- with innovation and materials inspired on the world to come.

‚ÄúFor me fashion is an expression of art that is very close related to me and to my body.
I see it as my expression of identity combined with desire, moods and cultural setting.

In all my work I try to make clear that fashion is an artistic expression, showing and wearing art, and not just a functional and devoid of content or commercial tool. With my work I intend to show that fashion can certainly have an added value to the world,  that it can be timeless and that its consumption can be less important then its beginning. Wearing clothing creates an exciting and imperative form of self-expression. 'Form follows function'‚Äã is not a slogan with which I concur. On the contrary, I find that forms complement and change the body and thus the emotion. Movement, so essential to and in the body, is just as important in my work. By bringing form, structure and  materials together in a new manner, I try to suggest and realize optimal tension and movement.‚Äù

Iris her designs require every time an unique treatment of material or even the creation of complete new materials. For this reason, Van Herpen prefers interdisciplinary research
and often collaborates with other artists or scientists.

Choose Dopper. Our oceans will thank you.  

At Dopper we‚Äôre on a mission. Empowering people to choose reusable over single-use water bottles, to protect our world‚Äôs water sources.  

Because, crystal clear water. That‚Äôs what we all want right? Bad news, single-use plastic doesn‚Äôt care. Every minute a truckload of plastic waste enters our oceans. And in that same minute 1 million single-use plastic bottles are purchased.  

Coincidence? We don‚Äôt think so. We decided to take action by creating a reusable water bottle that is putting single-use ones out of business.  

Are you ready to start making Impact with a capital I? Each Dopper sold contributes to our mission. From raising awareness and helping us educate others, to kick-starting clean drinking water projects in Nepal.  

Good Karma? You bet.  

Join our movement of changemakers. Find out more on www.dopper.com.

We believe everyone has a superpower. Maybe even more than one (sorry, riding with no hands doesn‚Äôt count). Our vision? A company full of people striving to be the absolute best at what they do. It‚Äôs not about being a know-it-all ‚Äì it‚Äôs about being an expert.

Tacx is an innovative company with great passion for sport and technique. This passion drives the organisation and can be seen in all departments; from purchasing to production and product development to logistics.

WE LOVE CYCLING
Since the beginning we have been highly involved in cycling, which has always guided us in our decisions and brought us to where we are today. When riders required high quality bike parts, we made this happen by producing them ourselves. When riders required a way to warm-up before a race, we started making rollers. When riders needed to train effectively during winter, we started making indoor bike trainers. And when more efficiency was required in their training, we made them interactive.  

INVENTING THE FUTURE
We have a history of inventing the future. We take up the greatest challenges and keep pushing limits of what is technically possible to create ground-breaking products with state-of-the-art designs. We were the first to connect computer electronics to bike trainers , in the year 2000, and introduce an entirely new way of training. In 2015 we develop the NEO Smart; the most accurate, realistic, powerful and silent trainer to date, thanks to a unique piece of trainer technology. Parallel to the development of the NEO we develop the Magnum: the first treadmill you can cycle on, enabling you to ride completely free and experience actual inclines.  

TACX FACTS

1957
Tacx was founded by Koos Tacx sr. on May 1st 1957 in the Netherlands.

Produced in the Netherlands
All our products are fully produced in the Netherlands.

Family company
Three generations of cyclist fanatics work together to create the impossible.

A Garmin company
In 2019 Garmin acquired Tacx, enabling endless technological possibilities.

Driven by innovation
Creating innovative products is what drives our organisation.

REV‚ÄôIT! Sport International designs and manufactures fashionable motorcycle gear for aficionados ‚Äì functional clothing of the highest quality. Operating out of offices in Oss, the Netherlands, New York City and in the nearby future Hong Kong, REV‚ÄôIT! is one of the fastest growing motorcycle clothing brands worldwide. Recognized as a benchmark for good product design in the industry, REV'IT! is available in more than 70 countries and worn by avid bikers throughout the world.

At REV'IT! we want to inspire people to ride, in everything we do. We want to inspire by making well designed and innovative products, allowing people to ride better, safer and looking good. 

We believe in an open and transparent culture and in the quality and skills of our people. We have no directive, micro-managing leadership. The Organic Cotton Accelerator (OCA) is the only multi-stakeholder organisation dedicated to organic cotton. As a global platform, we are committed to bringing integrity, supply security and measurable social and environmental impact to organic cotton. 

OCA envisions a future where we have fully realised the Organic Cotton Effect - organic cotton‚Äôs powerful and positive impact on people, planet and prosperity. We unite the sector to unleash the potential of organic cotton because we believe that by working together, we can create the conditions for organic cotton to thrive. 

Since our establishment in 2016, with founding partners Laudes Foundation, H&M, Kering, Eileen Fisher, Textile Exchange, Tchibo, Inditex and C&A, OCA has been committed to convening the sector around a common agenda and using our platform‚Äôs collective investments to act as a catalyst for change. 

Every dollar invested in OCA Programmes improves farmer profitability and prosperity, contributes to environmental sustainability, and ultimately bolsters the integrity of the cotton sector. But for us to fully unlock the Organic Cotton Effect, to truly unleash the potential of organic cotton, to genuinely drive behaviour change throughout the chain - we need sustained investment across the sector. 

We know we can‚Äôt do this alone, so we warmly welcome partners to join our movement. Partners who understand that organic cotton is not simply an end goal to meet demand. Neither is it simply a set of practices that can be mastered overnight. Partners who are willing to join us on a journey ‚Äì of which the first milestone is farmers and the final milestone is volume targets. Partners who know there is no such thing as a turnkey organic solution; they‚Äôre as committed as we are to the long-term work required to create meaningful change in this sector. 

Change is possible. The time to act is now.

description:

With extensive knowledge of the (bio)plastics industry, colorants and additives, colorFabb explored the opportunities in the world of 3D printing. 
Rigorous testing and experimenting made a new grade of PLA (PLA/PHA) became available in 2013. Followed by special filaments like woodFill, bronzeFill, the first filament with actual bronze particles in it, resulting in truly stunning prints when post-processed. 

Meanwhile, light weight PLA (LW-PLA) filament was born. It uses active foam technology to 3D print low weight and low-density PLA parts.

In 2018, colorFabb launched Color on Demand, a first step in true customization of filaments and polymers to suit the customers' specific needs.

colorFabb filaments are applied in a large scale of applications, Automotive, Medical and Dental, Aerospace & Defense, and very often in Art and Design.

The colorFabb team consists of extrusion operators ensuring quality control, a logistics department that ships to over 60 countries worldwide every year, 3D print engineers who test all filaments and many more professionals. All of them dedicated to the quality and service the colorFabb brand is known for.

Contact us via sales@colorfabb.com to see how we can help you to implement 3D printing in your company.

WakaWaka is an award-winning social enterprise that develops, manufactures and markets the world‚Äôs most efficient solar lamps and chargers. Our mission is to share the abundant power of the sun with more than a billion people worldwide who don‚Äôt have the luxury of a light switch and another billion who don‚Äôt have reliable access. 

WakaWaka‚Äôs safe, sustainable and clean solar solutions serve both developed and developing countries: the same premium, high-quality products for all markets. Through our line of portable solar products crafted from world-famous Dutch design, WakaWaka  (which means ‚Äúshine bright‚Äù in Swahili) provides an abundant and reliable alternative to kerosene. Kerosene, the most frequently used substitute for those living without access to electricity, comes at a high cost to health and pocketbook: It is highly flammable, toxic and associated with a host of serious health problems. Our products have empowered more than a million people, boosting family and community health, and providing families with longer productive hours during which to work, study, eat and pray.

As a global social enterprise, WakaWaka has leveraged the high demand for its products to maximize impact by instituting a Share the Sun model: Buy a WakaWaka and you also share the sun with someone without access to electricity.

Two steps ahead

When Tony Tonnaer founded the Kings of Indigo company eight years ago, his objective was clear; to produce clothing in a sustainable way both socially and environmentally, without compromising on quality. He believed that neither sustainability nor quality had to be sacrificed in order to make beautiful garments. Since then, what it means to be 'sustainable' has evolved and become more intricate, and the future promises further changes.

The brand works with a clear objective to lead the industry to change. But that forward thinking has helped shape and change the path of fashion, Kings of Indigo always being two steps ahead of the rest. Kings of Indigo positions itself as a pioneer in this ever-changing sustainable fashion world, innovating with materials and sustainable production methods, constantly exploring how to reduce the impact on the planet and people; using its Five Pillars of Sustainability as cornerstones.

BUDDHA TO BUDDHA: EMBRACE LIFE
Buddha to Buddha was born in 1997 during a meditation holiday in Asia. In his quest, the founder wanted to capture the deeper experience of both contemplation and celebration. He drew a sketch of a bracelet and a sample was made by a local silversmith. The first bracelet was born and named Batul. Through the years Buddha to Buddha became renowned for its handmade premium bracelets. The Buddha to Buddha jewellery collection is the embodiment of that deeper feeling. Designed in Amsterdam and handcrafted by the finest silversmiths in the Asian Pacific region.

PURE CELEBRATION AND PURE CONTEMPLATION
Today Buddha to Buddha is more than jewellery. It‚Äôs a lifestyle. A style that embraces life. That embraces the contradictions in life. It connects and shines like silver and it‚Äôs raw and warm like leather. Solid and organic. Buddha to Buddha is pure in its extremes. No blending. No compromises. 100% passion and pride.

Roetz is een sociale onderneming, die zich als doel heeft gesteld om bij te dragen aan een inclusieve en circulaire samenleving. Roetz maakt fietsen op basis van hergebruikte onderdelen van weesfietsen en cre√´ert daarmee werk en een opleidingstraject binnen een industrie die zit te springen om mensen. In augustus 2016 heeft Roetz een sociale fietsfabriek geopend aan het Gedempt Hamerkanaal in Amsterdam Noord.

Roetz heeft zowel een groene als een sociale missie. Fietsen krijgen een tweede leven, mensen een tweede kans. We zijn ervan overtuigd dat mensen met kwetsbaarheden even goed mee kunnen draaien op de reguliere arbeidsmarkt. Om deze overtuiging kracht bij te zetten hebben we ons middels een prestatielening gecommitteerd aan een concrete doelstelling; in 2021 hebben 10 makers een arbeidsovereenkomst van 24u per week voor de duur van ten minste 1 jaar. 

Voor het aanmelden van kandidaten kan je contact opnemen met onze participatieregisseur via info@roetz-bikes.nl. 

----------

At Roetz, we believe in second chances and pursue a circular and inclusive future. We don‚Äôt judge a book by its cover: where others see waste and inability, we see useful materials and promising talent. At the Amsterdam-based Roetz Fair Factory, men and women with poor job prospects make new bikes from discarded ones. By hand and with pride. We train them to become skilled bicycle technicians and do everything in our power to help them find permanent employment. 

We want nothing less than changing the world for the better. That is why we are a Social Enterprise putting social impact first. With the Fair Factory, we prove that running a business and having a social heart can go hand in hand.

description:
Al 30 jaar is 999 Games actief als uitgever en distributeur van bord- en kaartspellen in de Benelux en staat zij bekend om titels zoals Catan, 30 Seconds, Halli Galli, Regenwormen, Boonanza, Saboteur, Carcassonne, Dominion en vele andere. 

Toen Michael Bruinsma al die jaren geleden 999 Games begon, was het aanbod op de spelletjesmarkt in Nederland al tientallen jaren nagenoeg onveranderd, vernieuwing was er nauwelijks. Op de buitenlandse markt was niet alleen dat aanbod er wel, het was ook nog eens uitdagender en leuker dan de spellen die in Nederland beschikbaar waren. Zorgen dat mensen zich hier bewust van worden, hen nieuwe spellen laten ervaren en deze zo goed mogelijk op de Nederlandse en Belgische markt beschikbaar te laten komen op een manier waarop consumenten dat het liefst zien, is sindsdien de missie van 999 Games. 

De focus van 999 Games ligt primair op de familiespeler, maar in de basis proberen we heel Nederland en Belgi√´ net zo enthousiast te krijgen voor (bord)spelletjes als wij zelf ook zijn. Dat betekent dat wij ook spellen voor andere doelgroepen uitgeven. Denk hierbij aan jongvolwassenen en starters, ‚Äúhardcore‚Äù bordspelfanaten en jonge kinderen (en alles wat daar tussenin zit). Daarbij proberen we spellen met verschillende mechanismen en in diverse prijscategorie√´n aan te bieden. Diversificatie en productontwikkeling zijn dus de belangrijkste pilaren van ons bedrijf. 
999 Games wil graag de beste en leukste bordspellen brengen voor iedereen, voor iedere gelegenheid op ieder moment.

At Arion, we believe that every runner, and every run, is completely unique.

Unfortunately, overwhelming data and excessive options mean many of us are running the wrong way and in the wrong shoes. Reducing our performance and increasing our injuries.

We require a better understanding of ourselves as individual runners. Our unique metrics, the meaning behind them, and the relationships between them.  Specific to our bodies, our technique, and our goals. Our individual "Running Identity"

Running is over categorized and under personalized making it can feel almost impossible to adapt our movement and improve our performance.

ARION is a next-generation innovation that grants you an unparalleled understanding of your Running Identity. Helping you run faster, longer, and safer. 

ARION is based on 10+ years of research and 7 patents and has been created by a team of highly motivated scientists, engineers and fitness enthusiasts. ARION comprises ultra-thin pressure-sensitive insoles that slip neatly and unnoticed under a runner‚Äôs own running shoe insoles. 

This transforms the shoe into a running lab that analyzes technique and identifies strengths, weaknesses and injury risks. The runner receives easy to understand real-time feedback to improve their technique which will bring more results and a lower risk of injury without years of training.

Epson is a global leader in imaging technologies. We make things that help people and businesses see the world a little differently. This page is managed by the Dutch office of Epson Europe B.V., the European headquarters of the Seiko Epson Corporation, and the company behind the global Epson brand.

We‚Äôve created an array of award-winning products for consumer, business, government, medical, finance and retail markets across the world. Our factories, based across the globe, manufacture a range of products that includes printers, scanners, projectors, point-of-sale terminals, smart glasses, GPS sports monitors, heart rate activity monitors and industrial robots. 

Epson is a Japanese brand that evolved from Seiko ‚Äì best known as one of the world‚Äôs foremost watchmakers. During the Tokyo Olympic Games in 1964, we developed ground breaking new electronic timing equipment which allowed race results to be printed out. Shortly after this innovation, in 1968, we launched the EP-101, the world‚Äôs smallest and first digital printer, from which the name Epson, the son of the EP was born. We‚Äôve continued innovating ever since, and now we‚Äôre one of the best-selling and most innovative brands in just about every market in which we operate. 

This page deals with our business in the Netherlands. Sister companies within our group manage their own pages to cater for other regions. 

We constantly strive to create innovative products that are reliable, recyclable and energy efficient because at Epson, we know that planning for the future requires a strong commitment to the environment. All of Epson‚Äôs activities in the Netherlands and Europe are geared towards achieving the goals set out in our Environmental Vision 2050 plan, and we are always happy to hear constructive ideas on how we can deliver those commitments and more.

It all started out in a skate shop in Arnhem, The Netherlands, back in 1993.

The streetwear scene was still in its early years but was in need of bit of fresh thinking. We started out with a couple of tight fit tees to which we applied some (at the time) very funky prints (you could actually use the word funky back then). We then moved on to make a pair of pinstripe cargo pants and as the cherry on the pie we made the (in)famous fur bikini.

Before long, the shop had become our very own laboratory and the brand gsus was born. We sold the first couple of collections out of a car trunk and then moved into our first real office building (old warehouse) in Amsterdam. 

By now we‚Äôve moved up a bit in the world, and about 50 meters to the left, we‚Äôre sold in 27 countries and a couple of hundred stores worldwide. But no matter how far and wide we‚Äôre spread, we still remain focused on bringing you the discoveries you‚Äôve grown used to from us (and a couple of curveballs every now and then).

Tiny Miracles is an Amsterdam- and India-based foundation and award-winning social enterprise. Our mission is to enable one million people get out and stay out of poverty by 2030. 

We create quality lifestyle products like bags, jewelry, notebooks and more, for both B2B and B2C markets. But even though our products are great, they are simply a means to a larger ambition: To create life-changing opportunities for people to truly live a life out of poverty and to inspire others to join us.

Since 2010, Tiny Miracles has been working hands-on and on the ground in the slums of Mumbai. It is our deep-rooted belief that our generation has the power to build a better, more equal world. 

That's why after over a decade of trial and error, we have developed an innovative approach that empowers people to break their own poverty cycle. And not only break it, but also to keep themselves out of it. Girls living on the street in 2010, today go to university. They have ambition, they dream. They are able to take their future in their own hands ‚Äì not just for themselves but also for generations to come.

Learn more:

Blog - www.medium.com/@tinymiracles
Shop - www.shop.tinymiracles.com/

Outfit company wear is al meer dan 25 jaar producent en leverancier van kleding voor bedrijven en verenigingen. Multicycle werd in 1977 opgericht in de Achterhoek. In die tijd groeide de vraag naar recreatieve fietsen, maar de gebruiksvriendelijkheid liet vaak nog te wensen over. Multicycle speelde hierop in met handgemaakte fietsen die comfort en kwaliteit boden. Vanaf de eerste dag zorgde de passie van de vakmensen bij Multicycle voor vernieuwing. 

Een doorbraak was het versnellingssysteem met vrijloop in de crank, dat schakelen veel eenvoudiger maakte dan met een conventionele derailleur. Ook met andere innovaties trok Multicycle vaak de aandacht, zoals hydraulische remmen en de eerste accuverlichting. 

Zo groeide Multicycle uit van een werkplaats met twee gepassioneerde pioniers tot een modern bedrijf, waar fietsliefhebbers werken, gedreven door passie, trots en persoonlijke aandacht. Swiss Made Excellence with an Amsterdam Character

Our story begins in the seventeenth century, when master clockmaker Ahasuerus Fromanteel and his family moved into a small workshop in the center of Amsterdam. Together with his son, mister Fromanteel revolutionized the clock-making industry by implementing the newly discovered pendulum mechanism into a series of standing clocks, which from that point on were suddenly able to tell time with an accuracy unlike anything the world had ever seen.

Today we remember and celebrate the Fromanteel legacy by carrying on his name for a new generation of Amsterdam watchmakers. Just like Ahasuerus, our offices and Concept Store are located deep in the heart of Amsterdam, along the famous Keizersgracht. 

Our watches are carefully assembled by true Swiss craftsmen in the Fromanteel Swiss Atelier in the city of Bienne ‚Äì guaranteeing a constant quality befitting of the Fromanteel name. The designs are as effortless as Amsterdam itself: stylish, elegant, functional and playful.

The doors of our Concept Store on the Keizersgracht 241 are open on Monday through Friday, between the hours of 9.30 and 17.30. Every visitor is greeted with a warm smile and a hot cup of coffee. Curious? Please do not hesitate to knock on our door. 

We are looking forward to welcoming you into our world.  

- Team Fromanteel

Pokon Naturado is met het consumentenmerk Pokon marktleider in Nederland op het gebied van biologische meststoffen, potgronden en aanverwante producten. Naast het merk Pokon produceert en levert Pokon Naturado ook diverse huismerken.

Proud to be Dutch
Summery Cosmedical Group is een jong, ambitieus en dynamisch bedrijf in de cosmetica branche. Onder ons label vallen onze eigen merken IK Skin Perfection en Cenzaa Nederland. Naast onze eigen merken voeren wij ook het merk Extenso Skincare in ons assortiment en kunt u bij ons terecht voor alle benodigdheden voor uw professionele instituut.

Kerntaak
Als producent van de Nederlandse merken Cenzaa Nederland en IK Skin Perfection bieden wij u de beste garanties, bewezen effecten, wetenschappelijke technologie√´n en de laatste trends. Onze essentie is, in partnership met u, het optimale uit uw instituut te halen! Summery Cosmedical Group ondersteunt u hierin niet alleen op product technisch niveau, ook op het gebied van verkoop, marketing en trainingen staan onze deskundige medewerkers voor u klaar. Onze persoonlijke service gaat veel verder dan het leveren van producten.

Missie
Het uiterlijk en innerlijke schoonheid stimuleren, met verantwoorde producten en diensten.

Visie
Summery Cosmedical streeft met haar persoonlijke service naar niet alleen schoonheid voor de mens, maar voor de gehele wereld waarin wij leven.

Voetbalshop.nl en Voetbalshop.be zijn 15 jaar geleden opgericht door Badge Direct BV, de direct marketing divisie van de Badge groep (www.badge.nl). Deze groep is al meer dan 30 jaar actief in de sport- en entertainment merchandise. Het Voetbalshop.nl team wil graag alles, van, voor en over voetbal brengen. Het is onze ambitie om als eerste de nieuwste producten voor de beste prijs online aan te bieden. We besteden veel aandacht aan de inkoop van A-merken met A-kwaliteit. We willen voor actieve voetballers en actieve fans een zo breed mogelijk assortiment presenteren in alle prijsklassen van voetbalschoenen, offici√´le wedstrijdkleding, voetbalteamkleding, voetbalfashion en fanproducten. Ook voor keepers, trainers en scheidsrechters presenteren we een interessant assortiment. Voetbalshop heeft ook een outlet waar je koopjes kunt vinden. Voetbalshop heeft directe banden met nationale en internationale voetbalclubs en andere belangrijke leveranciers van voetbalproducten. Zo kunnen wij jou altijd alles, van, voor en over voetbal brengen. Naast een geweldig online platform heet Voetbalshop ook meerdere fysieke winkels verdeeld over heel het land.

Filosofie
In de wereld van Anna van Toor‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ spelen vrouwen de hoofdrol en is stijl de bindende factor. Onze collecties
zijn dan ook ontworpen voor de stijlvolle, sportieve en eigentijdse vrouwen
die Nederland rijk is. De historie van Anna van Toor gaat terug naar 1918 en
sinds 1999 ontwerpen wij damesmode onder ons eigen merk Anna. Inmiddels
staat de 3e generatie aan het roer en gaat Anna van Toor op volle snelheid
vooruit. Recent hebben we ons aangesloten bij de Fair Wear Foundation,
wat inhoudt dat onze mode op een verantwoorde manier geproduceerd
wordt. Kwaliteit, klantgerichtheid en verantwoordelijkheid staan bij Anna
van Toor hoog in het vaandel en deze waarden zijn voelbaar in alle facetten
van ons bedrijf. Bij Anna van Toor gaat mode verder dan tijdelijke trends,
wij bieden de klant een unieke stijl. Wij laten ons ieder seizoen weer inspireren
door de verschillende stijliconen van vroeger en nu om de mooiste
collecties samen te stellen voor onze Anna vrouwen.

Missie
Anna van Toor is voor modeliefhebsters, van modeliefhebbers. Wij geloven
al bijna 100 jaar in sterke, kwalitatieve, tijdloze producten. We maken
gebruik van de allermooiste stoffen en materialen en hebben oog voor elk
detail. Onze creaties zijn een reflectie van de iconen waardoor wij ge√Ønspireerd
zijn; vrouwelijk en stijlvol met een vleugje eigenheid. Wij geloven dat
winkels en webshops meer zijn dan plaats waar kleding wordt verkocht.
Het is een Wereld waarin de Anna-klant juist d√≠e kledingstukken vindt, die
haar unieke karakter onderstreept. In deze Wereld, de Wereld van Anna,
is shoppen het ultieme luxe-momentje in het drukke sociale leven van de
Anna-klant.

Visie
Het cre√´ren van mode voor de zelfbewuste, ondernemende vrouw, waarmee
zij haar karakter onderstreept.

VEBE, member of the Condor Group, has over 75 years of experience in the development, manufacturing and distribution of a wide range of floor coverings. VEBE is with an annual production of 60 million square metres, one of the world leaders in the field of needle felt carpet, dirt trapper mats, runners, artificial grass, entrance mats and carpet tiles.

Profimex is a professional supplier of work wear and promotional products. With a wide range of costumers in all kinds of branches. One of our Unique  selling points is service. We want to be an extension of out costumers in many ways. For example workwear, this is for a lot of company's an non-priority issue. For us its THE issue.
So lets keep it that way! We supply, manage and over-watch the distribution and use of the complete workwear flow for our customers. We want to present our self not as another supplier, but as a reliable business partner.

Easy supplies, low cost by efficiency combined with the highest quality of workwear garments.
Let us do the things we do best so you can attend to you're core business.

As a producer of window decoration fabrics we have close to 20 years of experience. Thanks to our knowledge of fabrics, continuous innovation and close relationships with our customers, suppliers and partners, we are able to provide the market with high-quality innovative and inspiring collections. Our focus on quality, personal contact and our passion for textiles make us unique.

Growth through dedication
Lienesch was established in 2001 by Bennie Lienesch, a textile man in heart and soul with a vision centred around quality and personal contact. What started out as a small-size specialist in pleated blind fabrics has grown out into a supplier of window decoration fabrics with customers all over the world and almost 68 employees. Despite this growth, the personal dedication with which it all began, is still tangible today in every aspect of the company.

From specialist to total supplier
Whereas during the first ten years we focussed mainly on the development of pleated fabrics, today we apply our expertise to a much wider and complete range of window decoration fabrics for the residential as well as the project market. Our activities are coordinated from our head office in Haaksbergen in the Netherlands which includes our own warehouse, logistics and production department.
This is Sandwich. Since 1981 our ethos is to produce clothing for real women. Making them look good and encouraging them to feel great in the process.
